 2203:     chk_badarg(fun () -> process_flag(max_heap_size, #{ size => 1 bsl 64 }) end),
 2204: 
 2205:     chk_badarg(fun () -> process_flag(priority, 4711) end),
 2206:     chk_badarg(fun () -> process_flag(save_calls, hmmm) end),
 2207:     {P,Mref} = spawn_monitor(fun () -> receive "in vain" -> no end end),
 2208:     chk_badarg(fun () -> process_flag(P, save_calls, hmmm) end),
 2209:     chk_badarg(fun () -> process_flag(gurka, save_calls, hmmm) end),
 2210:     exit(P, die),
 2211:     chk_badarg(fun () -> process_flag(P, save_calls, 0) end),
 2212:     {'DOWN', Mref, process, P, die} = receive M -> M end,
 2213:     chk_badarg(fun () -> process_flag(P, save_calls, 0) end),
 2214:     ok.
 2215: 
 2216: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
 2217: 
 2218: otp_6237(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2219:     Slctrs = lists:map(fun (_) ->
 2220: 		spawn_link(fun () ->
 2221: 			    otp_6237_select_loop()
 2222: 		    end)
 2223: 	end,
 2224: 	lists:seq(1,5)),
 2225:     lists:foreach(fun (_) -> otp_6237_test() end, lists:seq(1, 100)),
 2226:     lists:foreach(fun (S) -> unlink(S),exit(S, kill) end, Slctrs), 
 2227:     ok.
 2228: 				
 2229: otp_6237_test() ->
 2230:     Parent = self(),
 2231:     Inited = make_ref(),
 2232:     Die = make_ref(),
 2233:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2234: 		register(otp_6237,self()),
 2235: 		otp_6237 = ets:new(otp_6237,
 2236: 		    [named_table,
 2237: 			ordered_set]),
 2238: 		ets:insert(otp_6237,
 2239: 		    [{I,I}
 2240: 			|| I <- lists:seq(1, 100)]),
 2241: 		%% Inserting a lot of bif timers
 2242: 		%% increase the possibility that
 2243: 		%% the test will fail when the
 2244: 		%% original cleanup order is used
 2245: 		lists:foreach( fun (_) ->
 2246: 			    erlang:send_after(1000000, self(), {a,b,c})
 2247: 		    end, lists:seq(1,1000)),
 2248: 		Parent ! Inited,
 2249: 		receive Die -> bye end
 2250: 	end),
 2251:     receive
 2252: 	Inited -> ok
 2253:     end,
 2254:     Pid ! Die,
 2255:     otp_6237_whereis_loop().
 2256: 
 2257: otp_6237_whereis_loop() ->
 2258:     case whereis(otp_6237) of
 2259: 	      undefined ->
 2260: 		  otp_6237 = ets:new(otp_6237,
 2261: 					   [named_table,ordered_set]),
 2262: 		  ets:delete(otp_6237),
 2263: 		  ok;
 2264: 	      _ ->
 2265: 		  otp_6237_whereis_loop()
 2266: 	  end.
 2267: 	     
 2268: otp_6237_select_loop() ->
 2269:     catch ets:select(otp_6237, ets:fun2ms(fun({K, does_not_exist}) -> K end)),
 2270:     otp_6237_select_loop().
 2271: 
 2272: 
 2273: -define(NoTestProcs, 10000).
 2274: -record(ptab_list_bif_info, {min_start_reds,
 2275: 			     tab_chunks,
 2276: 			     tab_chunks_size,
 2277: 			     tab_indices_per_red,
 2278: 			     free_term_proc_reds,
 2279: 			     term_procs_per_red,
 2280: 			     term_procs_max_reds,
 2281: 			     conses_per_red,
 2282: 			     debug_level}).
 2283: 
 2284: processes_large_tab(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2285:     sys_mem_cond_run(2048, fun () -> processes_large_tab_test() end).
 2286: 
 2287: processes_large_tab_test() ->
 2288:     enable_internal_state(),
 2289:     MaxDbgLvl = 20,
 2290:     MinProcTabSize = 2*(1 bsl 15),
 2291:     ProcTabSize0 = 1000000,
 2292:     ProcTabSize1 = case {erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 2293: 	    erlang:system_info(logical_processors)} of
 2294: 	{Schdlrs, Cpus} when is_integer(Cpus),
 2295: 	Schdlrs =< Cpus ->
 2296: 	    ProcTabSize0;
 2297: 	_ ->
 2298: 	    ProcTabSize0 div 4
 2299:     end,
 2300:     BT = erlang:system_info(build_type),
 2301:     ProcTabSize2 = case (BT =:= debug) or (BT =:= valgrind) of
 2302: 	true -> ProcTabSize1 - 500000;
 2303: 	false -> ProcTabSize1
 2304:     end,
 2305:     %% With high debug levels this test takes so long time that
 2306:     %% the connection times out; therefore, shrink the test on
 2307:     %% high debug levels.
 2308:     DbgLvl = case erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info) of
 2309: 		       #ptab_list_bif_info{debug_level = Lvl} when Lvl > MaxDbgLvl ->
 2310: 			   20;
 2311: 		       #ptab_list_bif_info{debug_level = Lvl} when Lvl < 0 ->
 2312: 			   ct:fail({debug_level, Lvl});
 2313: 		       #ptab_list_bif_info{debug_level = Lvl} ->
 2314: 			   Lvl
 2315: 		   end,
 2316:     ProcTabSize3 = ProcTabSize2 - (1300000 * DbgLvl div MaxDbgLvl),
 2317:     ProcTabSize = case ProcTabSize3 < MinProcTabSize of
 2318: 			    true -> MinProcTabSize;
 2319: 			    false -> ProcTabSize3
 2320: 			end,
 2321:     {ok, Peer, LargeNode} = ?CT_PEER(["+P", integer_to_list(ProcTabSize)]),
 2322:     Res = rpc:call(LargeNode, ?MODULE, processes_bif_test, []),
 2323:     case rpc:call(LargeNode,
 2324: 			erts_debug,
 2325: 			get_internal_state,
 2326: 			[processes_bif_info]) of
 2327: 	      #ptab_list_bif_info{tab_chunks = Chunks} when is_integer(Chunks),
 2328: 							    Chunks > 1 -> ok;
 2329: 	      PBInfo -> ct:fail(PBInfo)
 2330: 	  end,
 2331:     stop_node(Peer, LargeNode),
 2332:     chk_processes_bif_test_res(Res).
 2333: 
 2334: processes_default_tab(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2335:     sys_mem_cond_run(1024, fun () -> processes_default_tab_test() end).
 2336: 
 2337: processes_default_tab_test() ->
 2338:     {ok, Peer, DefaultNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 2339:     Res = rpc:call(DefaultNode, ?MODULE, processes_bif_test, []),
 2340:     stop_node(Peer, DefaultNode),
 2341:     chk_processes_bif_test_res(Res).
 2342: 
 2343: processes_small_tab(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2344:     {ok, Peer, SmallNode} = ?CT_PEER(["+P","1024"]),
 2345:     Res    = rpc:call(SmallNode, ?MODULE, processes_bif_test, []),
 2346:     PBInfo = rpc:call(SmallNode, erts_debug, get_internal_state, [processes_bif_info]),
 2347:     stop_node(Peer, SmallNode),
 2348:     true = PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.tab_chunks < 10,
 2349:     chk_processes_bif_test_res(Res).
 2350: 
 2351: processes_this_tab(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2352:     Mem = case {erlang:system_info(build_type),
 2353:                 erlang:system_info(allocator)} of
 2354:               {lcnt, {_, _Vsn, [sys_alloc], _Opts}} ->
 2355:                   %% When running +Mea min + lcnt we may need more memory
 2356:                   1024 * 4;
 2357:               _ ->
 2358:                   1024
 2359:           end,
 2360:     sys_mem_cond_run(Mem, fun () -> chk_processes_bif_test_res(processes_bif_test()) end).
 2361: 
 2362: chk_processes_bif_test_res(ok) -> ok;
 2363: chk_processes_bif_test_res({comment, _} = Comment) -> Comment;
 2364: chk_processes_bif_test_res(Failure) -> ct:fail(Failure).
 2365: 
 2366: print_processes_bif_info(#ptab_list_bif_info{min_start_reds = MinStartReds,
 2367: 					     tab_chunks = TabChunks,
 2368: 					     tab_chunks_size = TabChunksSize,
 2369: 					     tab_indices_per_red = TabIndPerRed,
 2370: 					     free_term_proc_reds = FreeTPReds,
 2371: 					     term_procs_per_red = TPPerRed,
 2372: 					     term_procs_max_reds = TPMaxReds,
 2373: 					     conses_per_red = ConsesPerRed,
 2374: 					     debug_level = DbgLvl}) ->
 2375:     io:format("processes/0 bif info on node ~p:~n"
 2376: 	      "Min start reductions = ~p~n"
 2377: 	      "Process table chunks = ~p~n"
 2378: 	      "Process table chunks size = ~p~n"
 2379: 	      "Process table indices per reduction = ~p~n"
 2380: 	      "Reduction cost for free() on terminated process struct = ~p~n"
 2381: 	      "Inspect terminated processes per reduction = ~p~n"
 2382: 	      "Max reductions during inspection of terminated processes = ~p~n"
 2383: 	      "Create cons-cells per reduction = ~p~n"
 2384: 	      "Debug level = ~p~n",
 2385: 	      [node(),
 2386: 	       MinStartReds,
 2387: 	       TabChunks,
 2388: 	       TabChunksSize,
 2389: 	       TabIndPerRed,
 2390: 	       FreeTPReds,
 2391: 	       TPPerRed,
 2392: 	       TPMaxReds,
 2393: 	       ConsesPerRed,
 2394: 	       DbgLvl]).
 2395: 
 2396: processes_bif_cleaner() ->
 2397:     receive {'EXIT', _, _} -> ok end,
 2398:     processes_bif_cleaner().
 2399: 
 2400: spawn_initial_hangarounds(Cleaner) ->
 2401:     TabSz = erlang:system_info(process_limit),
 2402:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(next_pid,TabSz),
 2403:     spawn_initial_hangarounds(Cleaner,
 2404: 			      TabSz,
 2405: 			      TabSz*2,
 2406: 			      0,
 2407: 			      []).
 2408: 
 2409: processes_unexpected_result(CorrectProcs, Procs) ->
 2410:     ProcInfo = [registered_name,
 2411: 		initial_call,
 2412: 		current_function,
 2413: 		status,
 2414: 		priority],
 2415:     MissingProcs = CorrectProcs -- Procs,
 2416:     io:format("Missing processes: ~p",
 2417: 	      [lists:map(fun (Pid) ->
 2418: 				 [{pid, Pid}
 2419: 				  | case process_info(Pid, ProcInfo) of
 2420: 					undefined -> [];
 2421: 					Res -> Res
 2422: 				    end]
 2423: 			 end,
 2424: 			 MissingProcs)]),
 2425:     SuperfluousProcs = Procs -- CorrectProcs,
 2426:     io:format("Superfluous processes: ~p",
 2427: 	      [lists:map(fun (Pid) ->
 2428: 				 [{pid, Pid}
 2429: 				  | case process_info(Pid, ProcInfo) of
 2430: 					undefined -> [];
 2431: 					Res -> Res
 2432: 				    end]
 2433: 			 end,
 2434: 			 SuperfluousProcs)]),
 2435:     ct:fail(unexpected_result).
 2436: 
 2437: hangaround(Cleaner, Type) ->
 2438:     %% Type is only used to distinguish different processes from
 2439:     %% when doing process_info
 2440:     try link(Cleaner) catch error:Reason -> exit(Reason) end,
 2441:     receive after infinity -> ok end,
 2442:     exit(Type).
 2443: 
 2444: spawn_initial_hangarounds(_Cleaner, NP, Max, Len, HAs) when NP > Max ->
 2445:     {Len, HAs};
 2446: spawn_initial_hangarounds(Cleaner, NP, Max, Len, HAs) ->
 2447:     Skip = 30,
 2448:     wait_for_proc_slots(Skip+3),
 2449:     HA1 = spawn_opt(?MODULE, hangaround, [Cleaner, initial_hangaround],
 2450: 		    [{priority, low}]),
 2451:     HA2 = spawn_opt(?MODULE, hangaround, [Cleaner, initial_hangaround],
 2452: 		    [{priority, normal}]),
 2453:     HA3 = spawn_opt(?MODULE, hangaround, [Cleaner, initial_hangaround],
 2454: 		    [{priority, high}]),
 2455:     spawn_drop(Skip),
 2456:     spawn_initial_hangarounds(Cleaner, NP+Skip, Max, Len+3, [HA1,HA2,HA3|HAs]).
 2457: 
 2458: wait_for_proc_slots(MinFreeSlots) ->
 2459:     case erlang:system_info(process_limit) - erlang:system_info(process_count) of
 2460:         FreeSlots when FreeSlots < MinFreeSlots ->
 2461:             receive after 10 -> ok end,
 2462:             wait_for_proc_slots(MinFreeSlots);
 2463:         _FreeSlots ->
 2464:             ok
 2465:     end.
 2466: 
 2467: spawn_drop(N) when N =< 0 ->
 2468:     ok;
 2469: spawn_drop(N) ->
 2470:     spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 2471:     spawn_drop(N-1).
 2472: 
 2473: do_processes(WantReds) ->
 2474:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left, WantReds),
 2475:     processes().
 2476: 
 2477: processes_bif_test() ->
 2478:     Tester = self(),
 2479:     enable_internal_state(),
 2480:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 2481:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 2482:     WantReds = PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds + 10,
 2483:     WillTrap = case PBInfo of
 2484: 	#ptab_list_bif_info{tab_chunks = Chunks} when Chunks < 10 ->
 2485: 	    false; %% Skip for small tables
 2486: 	#ptab_list_bif_info{tab_chunks = Chunks,
 2487: 	    tab_chunks_size = ChunksSize,
 2488: 	    tab_indices_per_red = IndiciesPerRed
 2489: 	} ->
 2490: 	    Chunks*ChunksSize >= IndiciesPerRed*WantReds
 2491:     end,
 2492:     Processes = fun () ->
 2493: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,WantReds),
 2494: 	    processes()
 2495:     end,
 2496: 
 2497:     ok = do_processes_bif_test(WantReds, WillTrap, Processes),
 2498: 
 2499:     case WillTrap of
 2500: 	false ->
 2501: 	    ok;
 2502: 	true ->
 2503: 	    %% Do it against with a process suspended while
 2504: 	    %% in the processes/0 bif.
 2505: 	    erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 2506: 	    Suspendee = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2507: 						 Tester ! {suspend_me, self()},
 2508: 						 Tester ! {self(),
 2509: 							   done,
 2510: 							   hd(Processes())},
 2511: 						 receive
 2512: 						 after infinity ->
 2513: 							 ok
 2514: 						 end
 2515: 					 end),
 2516: 	    receive {suspend_me, Suspendee} -> ok end,
 2517: 	    erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 2518: 	    erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 2519: 	    
 2520: 	    [{status,suspended},{current_function,{erlang,ptab_list_continue,2}}] =
 2521: 		process_info(Suspendee, [status, current_function]),
 2522: 
 2523: 	    ok = do_processes_bif_test(WantReds, WillTrap, Processes),
 2524: 	    
 2525: 	    erlang:resume_process(Suspendee),
 2526: 	    receive {Suspendee, done, _} -> ok end,
 2527: 	    unlink(Suspendee),
 2528: 	    exit(Suspendee, bang)
 2529:     end,
 2530:     case get(processes_bif_testcase_comment) of
 2531: 	undefined -> ok;
 2532: 	Comment -> {comment, Comment}
 2533:     end.
 2534:     
 2535: do_processes_bif_test(WantReds, DieTest, Processes) ->
 2536:     Tester = self(),
 2537:     SpawnProcesses = fun (Prio) ->
 2538: 	    spawn_opt(?MODULE, do_processes, [WantReds], [link, {priority, Prio}])
 2539:     end,
 2540:     Cleaner = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2541: 		process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 2542: 		Tester ! {cleaner_alive, self()},
 2543: 		processes_bif_cleaner()
 2544: 	end),
 2545:     receive {cleaner_alive, Cleaner} -> ok end,
 2546:     try
 2547: 	DoIt = make_ref(),
 2548: 	GetGoing = make_ref(),
 2549: 	{NoTestProcs, TestProcs} = spawn_initial_hangarounds(Cleaner),
 2550: 	io:format("Testing with ~p processes~n", [NoTestProcs]),
 2551: 	SpawnHangAround = fun () ->
 2552: 		spawn(?MODULE, hangaround, [Cleaner, new_hangaround])
 2553: 	end,
 2554: 	Killer = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 2555: 		    Splt = NoTestProcs div 10,
 2556: 		    {TP1, TP23} = lists:split(Splt, TestProcs),
 2557: 		    {TP2, TP3} = lists:split(Splt, TP23),
 2558: 		    erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 2559: 		    Tester ! DoIt,
 2560: 		    receive GetGoing -> ok end,
 2561: 		    erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 2562: 		    SpawnProcesses(high),
 2563: 		    lists:foreach( fun (P) ->
 2564: 				SpawnHangAround(),
 2565: 				exit(P, bang)
 2566: 			end, TP1),
 2567: 		    SpawnProcesses(high),
 2568: 		    erlang:yield(),
 2569: 		    lists:foreach( fun (P) ->
 2570: 				SpawnHangAround(),
 2571: 				exit(P, bang)
 2572: 			end, TP2),
 2573: 		    SpawnProcesses(high),
 2574: 		    lists:foreach(
 2575: 			fun (P) ->
 2576: 				SpawnHangAround(),
 2577: 				exit(P, bang)
 2578: 			end, TP3)
 2579: 	    end, [{priority, high}, link]),
 2580: 	receive DoIt -> ok end,
 2581: 	process_flag(priority, low),
 2582: 	SpawnProcesses(low),
 2583: 	erlang:yield(),
 2584: 	process_flag(priority, normal),
 2585: 	CorrectProcs0 = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes),
 2586: 	Killer ! GetGoing,
 2587: 	erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left, WantReds),
 2588: 	Procs0 = processes(),
 2589: 	Procs = lists:sort(Procs0),
 2590: 	CorrectProcs = lists:sort(CorrectProcs0),
 2591: 	LengthCorrectProcs = length(CorrectProcs),
 2592: 	io:format("~p = length(CorrectProcs)~n", [LengthCorrectProcs]),
 2593: 	true = LengthCorrectProcs > NoTestProcs,
 2594: 	case CorrectProcs =:= Procs of
 2595: 	    true ->
 2596: 		ok;
 2597: 	    false ->
 2598: 		processes_unexpected_result(CorrectProcs, Procs)
 2599: 	end,
 2600: 	unlink(Killer),
 2601: 	exit(Killer, bang)
 2602:     after
 2603: 	unlink(Cleaner),
 2604:         exit(Cleaner, kill),
 2605:         %% Wait for the system to recover to a normal state...
 2606: 	wait_until_system_recover()
 2607:     end,
 2608:     do_processes_bif_die_test(DieTest, Processes),
 2609:     ok.
 2610: 
 2611: 
 2612: do_processes_bif_die_test(false, _Processes) ->
 2613:     io:format("Skipping test killing process executing processes/0~n",[]),
 2614:     ok;
 2615: do_processes_bif_die_test(true, Processes) ->
 2616:     do_processes_bif_die_test(5, Processes);
 2617: do_processes_bif_die_test(N, Processes) ->
 2618:     io:format("Doing test killing process executing processes/0~n",[]),
 2619:     try
 2620: 	Tester = self(),
 2621: 	Oooh_Nooooooo = make_ref(),
 2622: 	{_, DieWhileDoingMon} = erlang:spawn_monitor( fun () ->
 2623: 		    Victim = self(),
 2624: 		    spawn_opt(
 2625: 			fun () ->
 2626: 				exit(Victim, got_him)
 2627: 			end,
 2628: 			[link, {priority, max}]),
 2629: 		    Tester ! {Oooh_Nooooooo,
 2630: 			hd(Processes())},
 2631: 		    exit(ohhhh_nooooo)
 2632: 	    end),
 2633: 	receive
 2634: 	    {'DOWN', DieWhileDoingMon, _, _, Reason} ->
 2635: 		case Reason of
 2636: 		    got_him -> ok;
 2637: 		    _ -> throw({kill_in_trap, Reason})
 2638: 		end
 2639: 	end,
 2640: 	receive
 2641: 	    {Oooh_Nooooooo, _} ->
 2642: 		throw({kill_in_trap, 'Oooh_Nooooooo'})
 2643: 	after 0 ->
 2644: 		ok
 2645: 	end,
 2646: 	PrcsCllrsSeqLen = 2*erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 2647: 	PrcsCllrsSeq = lists:seq(1, PrcsCllrsSeqLen),
 2648: 	ProcsCallers = lists:map( fun (_) ->
 2649: 		    spawn_link(
 2650: 			fun () ->
 2651: 				Tester ! hd(Processes())
 2652: 			end)
 2653: 	    end, PrcsCllrsSeq),
 2654: 	erlang:yield(),
 2655: 	{ProcsCallers1, ProcsCallers2} = lists:split(PrcsCllrsSeqLen div 2,
 2656: 						     ProcsCallers),
 2657: 	process_flag(priority, high),
 2658: 	lists:foreach(
 2659: 		fun (P) ->
 2660: 			unlink(P),
 2661: 			exit(P, bang)
 2662: 		end,
 2663: 		lists:reverse(ProcsCallers2) ++ ProcsCallers1),
 2664: 	process_flag(priority, normal),
 2665: 	ok
 2666:     catch
 2667: 	throw:{kill_in_trap, R} when N > 0 ->
 2668: 	    io:format("Failed to kill in trap: ~p~n", [R]),
 2669: 	    io:format("Trying again~n", []),
 2670: 	    do_processes_bif_die_test(N-1, Processes)
 2671:     end.
 2672: 	    
 2673: 
 2674: wait_until_system_recover() ->
 2675:     %% If system hasn't recovered after 10 seconds we give up
 2676:     Tmr = erlang:start_timer(10000, self(), no_more_wait),
 2677:     wait_until_system_recover(Tmr).
 2678: 
 2679: wait_until_system_recover(Tmr) ->
 2680:     try
 2681: 	lists:foreach(fun (P) when P == self() ->
 2682: 			      ok;
 2683: 			  (P) ->
 2684: 			      case process_info(P, initial_call) of
 2685: 				  {initial_call,{?MODULE, _, _}} ->
 2686: 				      throw(wait);
 2687: 				  {initial_call,{_, _, _}} ->
 2688: 				      ok;
 2689: 				  undefined ->
 2690: 				      ok
 2691: 			      end
 2692: 		      end,
 2693: 		      processes())
 2694:     catch
 2695: 	throw:wait ->
 2696: 	    receive
 2697: 		{timeout, Tmr, _} ->
 2698: 		    Comment = "WARNING: Test processes still hanging around!",
 2699: 		    io:format("~s~n", [Comment]),
 2700: 		    put(processes_bif_testcase_comment, Comment),
 2701: 		    lists:foreach(
 2702: 		      fun (P) when P == self() ->
 2703: 			      ok;
 2704: 			  (P) ->
 2705: 			      case process_info(P, initial_call) of
 2706: 				  {initial_call,{?MODULE, _, _} = MFA} ->
 2707: 				      io:format("~p ~p~n", [P, MFA]);
 2708: 				  {initial_call,{_, _, _}} ->
 2709: 				      ok;
 2710: 				  undefined ->
 2711: 				      ok
 2712: 			      end
 2713: 		      end,
 2714: 		      processes())
 2715: 	    after 100 ->
 2716: 		    wait_until_system_recover(Tmr)
 2717: 	    end
 2718:     end,
 2719:     erlang:cancel_timer(Tmr),
 2720:     receive {timeout, Tmr, _} -> ok after 0 -> ok end,
 2721:     ok.
 2722: 
 2723: processes_last_call_trap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2724:     enable_internal_state(),
 2725:     Processes = fun () -> processes() end,
 2726:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 2727:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 2728:     WantReds = case PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds of
 2729: 	R when R > 10 -> R - 1;
 2730: 	_R -> 9
 2731:     end,
 2732:     lists:foreach(fun (_) ->
 2733: 		erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,
 2734: 		    WantReds),
 2735: 		Processes(),
 2736: 		erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,
 2737: 		    WantReds),
 2738: 		my_processes()
 2739: 	end,
 2740: 	lists:seq(1,100)).
 2741:     
 2742: my_processes() ->
 2743:     processes().
 2744: 
 2745: processes_apply_trap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2746:     enable_internal_state(),
 2747:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 2748:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 2749:     WantReds = case PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds of
 2750: 	R when R > 10 -> R - 1;
 2751: 	_R -> 9
 2752:     end,
 2753:     lists:foreach(fun (_) ->
 2754: 		erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,
 2755: 		    WantReds),
 2756: 		apply(erlang, processes, [])
 2757: 	end, lists:seq(1,100)).
 2758: 
 2759: processes_gc_trap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2760:     Tester = self(),
 2761:     enable_internal_state(),
 2762:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 2763:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 2764:     WantReds = PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds + 10,
 2765:     Processes = fun () ->
 2766: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,WantReds),
 2767: 	    processes()
 2768:     end,
 2769: 
 2770:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 2771:     Suspendee = spawn_link(fun () ->
 2772: 					 Tester ! {suspend_me, self()},
 2773: 					 Tester ! {self(),
 2774: 						   done,
 2775: 						   hd(Processes())},
 2776: 					 receive after infinity -> ok end
 2777: 				 end),
 2778:     receive {suspend_me, Suspendee} -> ok end,
 2779:     erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 2780:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 2781: 	    
 2782:     [{status,suspended}, {current_function,{erlang,ptab_list_continue,2}}]
 2783: 	= process_info(Suspendee, [status, current_function]),
 2784: 
 2785:     erlang:garbage_collect(Suspendee),
 2786:     erlang:garbage_collect(Suspendee),
 2787: 	    
 2788:     erlang:resume_process(Suspendee),
 2789:     receive {Suspendee, done, _} -> ok end,
 2790:     erlang:garbage_collect(Suspendee),
 2791:     erlang:garbage_collect(Suspendee),
 2792: 
 2793:     unlink(Suspendee),
 2794:     exit(Suspendee, bang),
 2795:     ok.
 2796: 
 2797: process_flag_fullsweep_after(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2798:     {fullsweep_after, OldFSA} = process_info(self(), fullsweep_after),
 2799:     OldFSA = process_flag(fullsweep_after, 12345),
 2800:     {fullsweep_after, 12345} = process_info(self(), fullsweep_after),
 2801:     12345 = process_flag(fullsweep_after, 0),
 2802:     {fullsweep_after, 0} = process_info(self(), fullsweep_after),
 2803:     0 = process_flag(fullsweep_after, OldFSA),
 2804:     ok.
 2805: 
 2806: process_flag_heap_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2807:     HSize  = 2586,   % must be gc fib+ number
 2808:     VHSize = 318187, % must be gc fib+ number
 2809:     OldHmin = erlang:process_flag(min_heap_size, HSize),
 2810:     {min_heap_size, HSize} = erlang:process_info(self(), min_heap_size),
 2811:     OldVHmin = erlang:process_flag(min_bin_vheap_size, VHSize),
 2812:     {min_bin_vheap_size, VHSize} = erlang:process_info(self(), min_bin_vheap_size),
 2813:     HSize = erlang:process_flag(min_heap_size, OldHmin),
 2814:     VHSize = erlang:process_flag(min_bin_vheap_size, OldVHmin),
 2815:     ok.
 2816: 
 2817: %% test that max_heap_size is correctly handled when passed via command line
 2818: command_line_max_heap_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2819:     %% test maximum heap size
 2820:     HMax = case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
 2821:                8 -> (1 bsl 59) - 1;
 2822:                4 -> (1 bsl 27) - 1
 2823:            end,
 2824:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+hmax", integer_to_list(HMax)]),
 2825:     Pid = erlang:spawn(Node, fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end),
 2826:     {max_heap_size, #{size := HMax}} = rpc:call(Node, erlang, process_info, [Pid, max_heap_size]),
 2827:     peer:stop(Peer).
 2828: 
 2829: spawn_opt_heap_size(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2830:     HSize  = 987,   % must be gc fib+ number
 2831:     VHSize = 46422, % must be gc fib+ number
 2832:     Pid  = spawn_opt(fun () -> receive stop -> ok end end,
 2833: 	[{min_heap_size, HSize},{ min_bin_vheap_size, VHSize}]),
 2834:     {min_heap_size, HSize} = process_info(Pid, min_heap_size),
 2835:     {min_bin_vheap_size, VHSize} = process_info(Pid, min_bin_vheap_size),
 2836:     Pid ! stop,
 2837:     ok.
 2838: 
 2839: spawn_opt_max_heap_size(_Config) ->
 2840: 
 2841:     error_logger:add_report_handler(?MODULE, self()),
 2842: 
 2843:     %% flush any prior messages in error_logger
 2844:     Pid = spawn(fun() -> ok = nok end),
 2845:     receive
 2846:         {error, _, {emulator, _, [Pid|_]}} ->
 2847:             flush()
 2848:     end,
 2849: 
 2850:     spawn_opt_max_heap_size_do(fun oom_fun/1),
 2851: 
 2852:     io:format("Repeat tests with refc binaries\n",[]),
 2853: 
 2854:     spawn_opt_max_heap_size_do(fun oom_bin_fun/1),
 2855: 
 2856:     error_logger:delete_report_handler(?MODULE),
 2857:     ok.
 2858: 
 2859: spawn_opt_max_heap_size_do(OomFun) ->
 2860:     Max = 2024,
 2861:     %% Test that numerical limit works
 2862:     max_heap_size_test(Max, Max, true, true, OomFun),
 2863: 
 2864:     %% Test that map limit works
 2865:     max_heap_size_test(#{ size => Max }, Max, true, true, OomFun),
 2866: 
 2867:     %% Test that no kill is sent
 2868:     max_heap_size_test(#{ size => Max, kill => false }, Max, false, true, OomFun),
 2869: 
 2870:     %% Test that no error_logger report is sent
 2871:     max_heap_size_test(#{ size => Max, error_logger => false }, Max, true, false, OomFun),
 2872: 
 2873:     %% Test that system_flag works
 2874:     erlang:system_flag(max_heap_size, OomFun(#{ size => 0, kill => false,
 2875:                                                 error_logger => true})),
 2876:     max_heap_size_test(#{ size => Max }, Max, false, true, OomFun),
 2877:     max_heap_size_test(#{ size => Max, kill => true }, Max, true, true, OomFun),
 2878: 
 2879:     erlang:system_flag(max_heap_size, OomFun(#{ size => 0, kill => true,
 2880:                                                 error_logger => false})),
 2881:     max_heap_size_test(#{ size => Max }, Max, true, false, OomFun),
 2882:     max_heap_size_test(#{ size => Max, error_logger => true }, Max, true, true, OomFun),
 2883: 
 2884:     erlang:system_flag(max_heap_size, OomFun(#{ size => 1 bsl 16, kill => true,
 2885:                                                 error_logger => true})),
 2886:     max_heap_size_test(#{ }, 1 bsl 16, true, true, OomFun),
 2887: 
 2888:     erlang:system_flag(max_heap_size, #{ size => 0, kill => true,
 2889:                                          error_logger => true}),
 2890: 
 2891:     %% Test that ordinary case works as expected again
 2892:     max_heap_size_test(Max, Max, true, true, OomFun),
 2893:     ok.
 2894: 
 2895: 
 2896: mhs_spawn_opt(Option) when map_get(size, Option) > 0;
 2897:                            is_integer(Option) ->
 2898:     [{max_heap_size, Option}];
 2899: mhs_spawn_opt(_) ->
 2900:     [].
 2901: 
 2902: max_heap_size_test(Option, Size, Kill, ErrorLogger, OomFun) ->
 2903:     SpOpt = mhs_spawn_opt(OomFun(Option)),
 2904:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun()-> OomFun(run) end, SpOpt),
 2905:     {max_heap_size, MHSz} = erlang:process_info(Pid, max_heap_size),
 2906:     ct:log("Default: ~p~nOption: ~p~nProc: ~p~nSize = ~p~nSpOpt = ~p~n",
 2907:            [erlang:system_info(max_heap_size), Option, MHSz, Size, SpOpt]),
 2908: 
 2909:     #{ size := Size} = MHSz,
 2910: 
 2911:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 2912:     if Kill ->
 2913:             receive
 2914:                 {'DOWN', Ref, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 2915:                     killed = Reason
 2916:             end;
 2917:        true ->
 2918:             ok
 2919:     end,
 2920:     if ErrorLogger ->
 2921:             receive
 2922:                 %% There must be at least one error message.
 2923:                 {error, _, {emulator, _, [Pid|_]}} ->
 2924:                     ok
 2925:             end;
 2926:        true ->
 2927:             ok
 2928:     end,
 2929:     if not Kill ->
 2930:             exit(Pid, die),
 2931:             receive
 2932:                 {'DOWN', Ref, process, Pid, die} ->
 2933:                     ok
 2934:             end,
 2935:             %% If the process was not killed, the limit may have
 2936:             %% been reached more than once and there may be
 2937:             %% more {error, ...} messages left.
 2938:             receive_error_messages(Pid);
 2939:        true ->
 2940:             ok
 2941:     end,
 2942: 
 2943:     %% Make sure that there are no unexpected messages.
 2944:     receive_unexpected().
 2945: 
 2946: oom_fun(Max) when is_integer(Max) -> Max;
 2947: oom_fun(Map) when is_map(Map)-> Map;
 2948: oom_fun(run) ->
 2949:     io:format("oom_fun() started\n",[]),
 2950:     oom_run_fun([], 100).
 2951: 
 2952: oom_run_fun(Acc0, 0) ->
 2953:     done;
 2954: oom_run_fun(Acc0, N) ->
 2955:     %% This is tail-recursive since the compiler is smart enough to figure
 2956:     %% out that a body-recursive variant never returns, and loops forever
 2957:     %% without keeping the list alive.
 2958:     timer:sleep(5),
 2959:     oom_run_fun([lists:seq(1, 1000) | Acc0], N-1).
 2960: 
 2961: oom_bin_fun(Max) when is_integer(Max) -> oom_bin_fun(#{size => Max});
 2962: oom_bin_fun(Map) when is_map(Map) -> Map#{include_shared_binaries => true};
 2963: oom_bin_fun(run) ->
 2964:     oom_bin_run_fun([], 10).
 2965: 
 2966: oom_bin_run_fun(Acc0, 0) ->
 2967:     done;
 2968: oom_bin_run_fun(Acc0, N) ->
 2969:     timer:sleep(5),
 2970:     oom_bin_run_fun([build_refc_bin(160, <<>>) | Acc0], N-1).
 2971: 
 2972: build_refc_bin(0, Acc) ->
 2973:     Acc;
 2974: build_refc_bin(N, Acc) ->
 2975:     build_refc_bin(N-1, <<Acc/binary, 0:(1000*8)>>).
 2976: 
 2977: 
 2978: receive_error_messages(Pid) ->
 2979:     receive
 2980:         {error, _, {emulator, _, [Pid|_]}} ->
 2981:             receive_error_messages(Pid)
 2982:     after 1000 ->
 2983:             ok
 2984:     end.
 2985: 
 2986: receive_unexpected() ->
 2987:     receive
 2988:         {info_report, _, _} ->
 2989:             %% May be an alarm message from os_mon. Ignore.
 2990:             receive_unexpected();
 2991:         M ->
 2992:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, M})
 2993:     after 10 ->
 2994:             ok
 2995:     end.
 2996: 
 2997: flush() ->
 2998:     receive
 2999:         _M -> flush()
 3000:     after 0 ->
 3001:             ok
 3002:     end.
 3003: 
 3004: %% Make sure that when maximum allowed heap size is exceeded, the
 3005: %% process will actually terminate.
 3006: %%
 3007: %% Despite the timetrap and limit of number of iterations, bugs
 3008: %% provoked by the test case can cause the runtime system to hang in
 3009: %% this test case.
 3010: more_spawn_opt_max_heap_size(_Config) ->
 3011:     ct:timetrap({minutes,1}),
 3012:     Funs = [fun build_and_bif/0,
 3013:             fun build_bin_and_bif/0,
 3014:             fun build_and_recv_timeout/0,
 3015:             fun build_and_recv_msg/0,
 3016:             fun bif_and_recv_timeout/0,
 3017:             fun bif_and_recv_msg/0
 3018:            ],
 3019:     _ = [begin
 3020:              {Pid,Ref} = spawn_opt(F, [{max_heap_size,
 3021:                                         #{size => 233, kill => true,
 3022:                                           error_logger => false}},
 3023:                                        monitor]),
 3024:              io:format("~p ~p\n", [Pid,F]),
 3025:              receive
 3026:                  {'DOWN',Ref,process,Pid,Reason} ->
 3027:                      killed = Reason
 3028:              end
 3029:          end || F <- Funs],
 3030:     ok.
 3031: 
 3032: %% This number should be greater than the default heap size.
 3033: -define(MANY_ITERATIONS, 10_000).
 3034: 
 3035: build_and_bif() ->
 3036:     build_and_bif(?MANY_ITERATIONS, []).
 3037: 
 3038: build_and_bif(0, Acc0) ->
 3039:     Acc0;
 3040: build_and_bif(N, Acc0) ->
 3041:     Acc = [0|Acc0],
 3042:     _ = erlang:crc32(Acc),
 3043:     build_and_bif(N-1, Acc).
 3044: 
 3045: build_bin_and_bif() ->
 3046:     build_bin_and_bif(?MANY_ITERATIONS, <<>>).
 3047: 
 3048: build_bin_and_bif(0, Acc0) ->
 3049:     Acc0;
 3050: build_bin_and_bif(N, Acc0) ->
 3051:     Acc = <<0, Acc0/binary>>,
 3052:     _ = erlang:crc32(Acc),
 3053:     build_bin_and_bif(N-1, Acc).
 3054: 
 3055: build_and_recv_timeout() ->
 3056:     build_and_recv_timeout(?MANY_ITERATIONS, []).
 3057: 
 3058: build_and_recv_timeout(0, Acc0) ->
 3059:     Acc0;
 3060: build_and_recv_timeout(N, Acc0) ->
 3061:     Acc = [0|Acc0],
 3062:     receive
 3063:     after 1 ->
 3064:             ok
 3065:     end,
 3066:     build_and_recv_timeout(N-1, Acc).
 3067: 
 3068: build_and_recv_msg() ->
 3069:     build_and_recv_msg(?MANY_ITERATIONS, []).
 3070: 
 3071: build_and_recv_msg(0, Acc0) ->
 3072:     Acc0;
 3073: build_and_recv_msg(N, Acc0) ->
 3074:     Acc = [0|Acc0],
 3075:     receive
 3076:         _ ->
 3077:             ok
 3078:     after 0 ->
 3079:             ok
 3080:     end,
 3081:     build_and_recv_msg(N-1, Acc).
 3082: 
 3083: bif_and_recv_timeout() ->
 3084:     Bin = <<0:?MANY_ITERATIONS/unit:8>>,
 3085:     bif_and_recv_timeout(Bin).
 3086: 
 3087: bif_and_recv_timeout(Bin) ->
 3088:     List = binary_to_list(Bin),
 3089:     receive
 3090:     after 1 ->
 3091:             ok
 3092:     end,
 3093:     List.
 3094: 
 3095: bif_and_recv_msg() ->
 3096:     Bin = <<0:?MANY_ITERATIONS/unit:8>>,
 3097:     bif_and_recv_msg(Bin).
 3098: 
 3099: bif_and_recv_msg(Bin) ->
 3100:     List = binary_to_list(Bin),
 3101:     receive
 3102:         _ ->
 3103:             ok
 3104:     after 0 ->
 3105:             ok
 3106:     end,
 3107:     List.
 3108: 
 3109: %% error_logger report handler proxy
 3110: init(Pid) ->
 3111:     {ok, Pid}.
 3112: 
 3113: handle_event(Event, Pid) ->
 3114:     Pid ! Event,
 3115:     {ok, Pid}.
 3116: 
 3117: huge_arglist_child(A0, A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9,
 3118:                    A10, A11, A12, A13, A14, A15, A16, A17, A18, A19,
 3119:                    A20, A21, A22, A23, A24, A25, A26, A27, A28, A29,
 3120:                    A30, A31, A32, A33, A34, A35, A36, A37, A38, A39,
 3121:                    A40, A41, A42, A43, A44, A45, A46, A47, A48, A49,
 3122:                    A50, A51, A52, A53, A54, A55, A56, A57, A58, A59,
 3123:                    A60, A61, A62, A63, A64, A65, A66, A67, A68, A69,
 3124:                    A70, A71, A72, A73, A74, A75, A76, A77, A78, A79,
 3125:                    A80, A81, A82, A83, A84, A85, A86, A87, A88, A89,
 3126:                    A90, A91, A92, A93, A94, A95, A96, A97, A98, A99,
 3127:                    A100, A101, A102, A103, A104, A105, A106, A107, A108, A109,
 3128:                    A110, A111, A112, A113, A114, A115, A116, A117, A118, A119,

 3130:                    A130, A131, A132, A133, A134, A135, A136, A137, A138, A139,
 3131:                    A140, A141, A142, A143, A144, A145, A146, A147, A148, A149,

 3133:                    A160, A161, A162, A163, A164, A165, A166, A167, A168, A169,
 3134:                    A170, A171, A172, A173, A174, A175, A176, A177, A178, A179,
 3135:                    A180, A181, A182, A183, A184, A185, A186, A187, A188, A189,
 3136:                    A190, A191, A192, A193, A194, A195, A196, A197, A198, A199,
 3137:                    A200, A201, A202, A203, A204, A205, A206, A207, A208, A209,
 3138:                    A210, A211, A212, A213, A214, A215, A216, A217, A218, A219,
 3139:                    A220, A221, A222, A223, A224, A225, A226, A227, A228, A229,
 3140:                    A230, A231, A232, A233, A234, A235, A236, A237, A238, A239,
 3141:                    A240, A241, A242, A243, A244, A245, A246, A247, A248, A249,
 3142:                    A250, A251, A252, A253, A254) ->
 3143:     receive go -> ok end,
 3144:     exit([A0, A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9,
 3145:           A10, A11, A12, A13, A14, A15, A16, A17, A18, A19,
 3146:           A20, A21, A22, A23, A24, A25, A26, A27, A28, A29,
 3147:           A30, A31, A32, A33, A34, A35, A36, A37, A38, A39,

 3155:           A110, A111, A112, A113, A114, A115, A116, A117, A118, A119,
 3156:           A120, A121, A122, A123, A124, A125, A126, A127, A128, A129,
 3157:           A130, A131, A132, A133, A134, A135, A136, A137, A138, A139,
 3158:           A140, A141, A142, A143, A144, A145, A146, A147, A148, A149,

 3171: spawn_huge_arglist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3172:     %% Huge in two different ways; encoded size and
 3173:     %% length...
 3174:     ArgListHead = [make_ref(),
 3175:                    lists:duplicate(1000000, $a),
 3176:                    <<1:8388608>>,
 3177:                    processes(),
 3178:                    erlang:ports(),
 3179:                    {hej, hopp},
 3180:                    <<17:8388608>>,
 3181:                    lists:duplicate(3000000, $x),
 3182:                    #{ a => 1, b => 2, c => 3, d => 4, e => 5}],
 3183:     ArgList = ArgListHead ++ lists:seq(1, 255 - length(ArgListHead)),
 3184: 
 3185:     io:format("size(term_to_binary(ArgList)) = ~p~n",
 3186:               [size(term_to_binary(ArgList))]),
 3187: 
 3188:     io:format("Testing spawn with huge argument list on local node...~n", []),
 3189:     spawn_huge_arglist_test(true, node(), ArgList),
 3190:     io:format("Testing spawn with huge argument list on local node with Node...~n", []),
 3191:     spawn_huge_arglist_test(false, node(), ArgList),
 3192:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3193:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3194:     io:format("Testing spawn with huge argument list on remote node ~p...~n", [Node]),
 3195:     spawn_huge_arglist_test(false, Node, ArgList),
 3196:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3197:     ok.
 3198: 
 3199: spawn_huge_arglist_test(Local, Node, ArgList) ->
 3200: 
 3201:     R1 = case Local of
 3202:              true ->
 3203:                  spawn_request(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor]);
 3204:              false ->
 3205:                  spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor])
 3206:          end,
 3207:     receive
 3208:         {spawn_reply, R1, ok, Pid1} ->
 3209:             Pid1 ! go,
 3210:             receive
 3211:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, Pid1, Reason1} ->
 3212:                     ArgList = Reason1
 3213:             end
 3214:     end,
 3215: 
 3216:     {Pid2, R2} = case Local of
 3217:                      true ->
 3218:                          spawn_monitor(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList);
 3219:                      false ->
 3220:                          spawn_monitor(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList)
 3221:                  end,
 3222:     Node = node(Pid2),
 3223:     Pid2 ! go,
 3224:     receive
 3225:         {'DOWN', R2, process, Pid2, Reason2} ->
 3226:             ArgList = Reason2
 3227:     end,
 3228:     
 3229:     {Pid3, R3} = case Local of
 3230:                      true ->
 3231:                          spawn_opt(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor]);
 3232:                      false ->
 3233:                          spawn_opt(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList, [monitor])
 3234:                  end,
 3235:     Node = node(Pid3),
 3236:     Pid3 ! go,
 3237:     receive
 3238:         {'DOWN', R3, process, Pid3, Reason3} ->
 3239:             ArgList = Reason3
 3240:     end,
 3241: 
 3242:     OldTA = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3243:     Pid4 = case Local of
 3244:                true ->
 3245:                    spawn_link(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList);
 3246:                false ->
 3247:                    spawn_link(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList)
 3248:            end,
 3249:     Node = node(Pid4),
 3250:     Pid4 ! go,
 3251:     receive
 3252:         {'EXIT', Pid4, Reason4} ->
 3253:             ArgList = Reason4
 3254:     end,
 3255: 
 3256:     true = process_flag(trap_exit, OldTA),
 3257: 
 3258:     Pid5 = case Local of
 3259:                true ->
 3260:                    spawn(?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList);
 3261:                false ->
 3262:                    spawn(Node, ?MODULE, huge_arglist_child, ArgList)
 3263:            end,
 3264:     Node = node(Pid5),
 3265:     R5 = erlang:monitor(process, Pid5),
 3266:     Pid5 ! go,
 3267:     receive
 3268:         {'DOWN', R5, process, Pid5, Reason5} ->
 3269:             ArgList = Reason5
 3270:     end,
 3271:     ok.
 3272: 
 3273: spawn_request_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3274:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on local node...~n", []),
 3275:     spawn_request_bif_test(true, node()),
 3276:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on local node with Node...~n", []),
 3277:     spawn_request_bif_test(false, node()),
 3278:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3279:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() on remote node ~p...~n", [Node]),
 3280:     spawn_request_bif_test(false, Node),
 3281:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3282:     ok.
 3283:                        
 3284: spawn_request_bif_test(Local, Node) ->
 3285: 
 3286:     Me = self(),
 3287: 
 3288:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3289: 
 3290:     T1 = {test, 1},
 3291:     F1 = fun () -> exit({exit, T1}) end,
 3292:     R1 = if Local ->
 3293:                  spawn_request(F1, [{reply_tag, T1}, monitor, link]);
 3294:             true ->
 3295:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [{reply_tag, T1}, monitor, link])
 3296:          end,
 3297:     receive
 3298:         {T1, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3299:             receive
 3300:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, {exit, T1}} ->
 3301:                     ok
 3302:             end,
 3303:             receive
 3304:                 {'EXIT', P1, {exit, T1}} ->
 3305:                     ok
 3306:             end
 3307:     end,
 3308: 
 3309:     R1b = if Local ->
 3310:                  spawn_request(F1, [monitor, link]);
 3311:             true ->
 3312:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [monitor, link])
 3313:          end,
 3314:     receive
 3315:         {spawn_reply, R1b, ok, P1b} ->
 3316:             receive
 3317:                 {'DOWN', R1b, process, P1b, {exit, T1}} ->
 3318:                     ok
 3319:             end,
 3320:             receive
 3321:                 {'EXIT', P1b, {exit, T1}} ->
 3322:                     ok
 3323:             end
 3324:     end,
 3325: 
 3326:     Ref1c = make_ref(),
 3327:     F1c = fun () -> Me ! Ref1c end,
 3328:     R1c = if Local ->
 3329:                   spawn_request(F1c);
 3330:              true ->
 3331:                   spawn_request(Node, F1c)
 3332:             end,
 3333:     receive
 3334:         {spawn_reply, R1c, ok, _P1c} ->
 3335:             receive Ref1c -> ok end
 3336:     end,
 3337: 
 3338:     R1e = if Local ->
 3339:                  spawn_request(F1, [monitors, links, {reply_tag, T1}]);
 3340:             true ->
 3341:                  spawn_request(Node, F1, [monitors, links, {reply_tag, T1}])
 3342:          end,
 3343:     receive
 3344:         {T1, R1e, error, BadOpt1} ->
 3345:             badopt = BadOpt1,
 3346:             ok
 3347:     end,
 3348:     ok = try
 3349:              BadF = fun (X) -> exit({X,T1}) end,
 3350:              if Local ->
 3351:                      spawn_request(BadF, [monitor, {reply_tag, T1}, link]);
 3352:                 true ->
 3353:                      spawn_request(Node, BadF, [monitor, {reply_tag, T1}, link])
 3354:              end,
 3355:              nok
 3356:          catch
 3357:              error:badarg -> ok
 3358:          end,
 3359:     ok = try
 3360:              spawn_request(<<"node">>, F1, [monitor, link], T1),
 3361:              nok
 3362:          catch
 3363:              error:badarg -> ok
 3364:          end,
 3365: 
 3366:     T2 = {test, 2},
 3367:     M2 = erlang,
 3368:     F2 = exit,
 3369:     Reason2 = {exit, T2},
 3370:     Args2 = [Reason2],
 3371:     R2 = if Local ->
 3372:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}]);
 3373:             true ->
 3374:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}])
 3375:             end,
 3376:     receive
 3377:         {T2, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3378:             receive
 3379:                 {'DOWN', R2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3380:                     ok
 3381:             end,
 3382:             receive
 3383:                 {'EXIT', P2, Reason2} ->
 3384:                     ok
 3385:             end
 3386:     end,
 3387: 
 3388:     R2b = if Local ->
 3389:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link]);
 3390:             true ->
 3391:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link])
 3392:             end,
 3393:     receive
 3394:         {spawn_reply, R2b, ok, P2b} ->
 3395:             receive
 3396:                 {'DOWN', R2b, process, P2b, Reason2} ->
 3397:                     ok
 3398:             end,
 3399:             receive
 3400:                 {'EXIT', P2b, Reason2} ->
 3401:                     ok
 3402:             end
 3403:     end,
 3404: 
 3405:     Ref2c = make_ref(),
 3406:     R2c = if Local ->
 3407:                   spawn_request(erlang, send, [Me, Ref2c]);
 3408:              true ->
 3409:                   spawn_request(Node, erlang, send, [Me, Ref2c])
 3410:             end,
 3411:     receive
 3412:         {spawn_reply, R2c, ok, _P2c} ->
 3413:             receive Ref2c -> ok end
 3414:     end,
 3415: 
 3416:     R2e = if Local ->
 3417:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, {reply_tag, T2}, links]);
 3418:             true ->
 3419:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, {reply_tag, T2}, links])
 3420:          end,
 3421:     receive
 3422:         {T2, R2e, error, BadOpt2} ->
 3423:             badopt = BadOpt2,
 3424:             ok
 3425:     end,
 3426: 
 3427:     R2eb = if Local ->
 3428:                  spawn_request(M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, links]);
 3429:             true ->
 3430:                  spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, Args2, [monitors, links])
 3431:          end,
 3432:     receive
 3433:         {spawn_reply, R2eb, error, BadOpt2b} ->
 3434:             badopt = BadOpt2b,
 3435:             ok
 3436:     end,
 3437: 
 3438:     ok = try
 3439:              if Local ->
 3440:                      spawn_request(M2, F2, [Args2|oops], [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}]);
 3441:                 true ->
 3442:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, [Args2|oops], [monitor, link, {reply_tag, T2}])
 3443:              end,
 3444:              nok
 3445:          catch
 3446:              error:badarg -> ok
 3447:          end,
 3448:     ok = try
 3449:              if Local ->
 3450:                      spawn_request(M2, F2, [Args2|oops], [monitor, {reply_tag, blupp}, link]);
 3451:                 true ->
 3452:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, [Args2|oops], [monitor, {reply_tag, blupp}, link])
 3453:              end,
 3454:              nok
 3455:          catch
 3456:              error:badarg -> ok
 3457:          end,
 3458:     ok = try
 3459:              if Local ->
 3460:                      spawn_request(M2, F2, [Args2|oops]);
 3461:                 true ->
 3462:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, F2, [Args2|oops])
 3463:              end,
 3464:              nok
 3465:          catch
 3466:              error:badarg -> ok
 3467:          end,
 3468:     ok = try
 3469:              if Local ->
 3470:                      spawn_request(M2, <<"exit">>, Args2, [monitor, {reply_tag, T2}, link]);
 3471:                 true ->
 3472:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, <<"exit">>, Args2, [monitor, {reply_tag, T2}, link])
 3473:              end,
 3474:              nok
 3475:          catch
 3476:              error:badarg -> ok
 3477:          end,
 3478:     ok = try
 3479:              if Local ->
 3480:                      spawn_request(M2, <<"exit">>, Args2, [monitor, link]);
 3481:                 true ->
 3482:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, <<"exit">>, Args2, [monitor, link])
 3483:              end,
 3484:              nok
 3485:          catch
 3486:              error:badarg -> ok
 3487:          end,
 3488:     ok = try
 3489:              if Local ->
 3490:                      spawn_request(M2, <<"exit">>, Args2);
 3491:                 true ->
 3492:                      spawn_request(Node, M2, <<"exit">>, Args2)
 3493:              end,
 3494:              nok
 3495:          catch
 3496:              error:badarg -> ok
 3497:          end,
 3498:     ok = try
 3499:              if Local ->
 3500:                      spawn_request(<<"erlang">>, F2, Args2, [{reply_tag, T2}, monitor, link]);
 3501:                 true ->
 3502:                      spawn_request(Node, <<"erlang">>, F2, Args2, [{reply_tag, T2}, monitor, link])
 3503:              end,
 3504:              nok
 3505:          catch
 3506:              error:badarg -> ok
 3507:          end,
 3508:     ok = try
 3509:              if Local ->
 3510:                      spawn_request(<<"erlang">>, F2, Args2, [monitor, link]);
 3511:                 true ->
 3512:                      spawn_request(Node, <<"erlang">>, F2, Args2, [monitor, link])
 3513:              end,
 3514:              nok
 3515:          catch
 3516:              error:badarg -> ok
 3517:          end,
 3518:     ok = try
 3519:              if Local ->
 3520:                      spawn_request(<<"erlang">>, F2, Args2);
 3521:                 true ->
 3522:                      spawn_request(Node, <<"erlang">>, F2, Args2)
 3523:              end,

 3530:              nok

 3533:          end,

 3535:              spawn_request(<<"node">>, M2, F2, Args2, [monitor, link]),

 3542:              nok

 3548: 
 3549: spawn_request_monitor_demonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3550:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3551:     BlockFun = fun () ->
 3552:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 3553:                        erts_debug:set_internal_state(block, 1000),
 3554:                        ok
 3555:                end,
 3556: 
 3557:     %% Block receiver node...
 3558:     spawn_request(Node, BlockFun, [{priority,max}, link]),
 3559:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 3560: 
 3561:     erlang:yield(),
 3562:     R = spawn_request(Node, timer, sleep, [10000], [monitor]),
 3563:     %% Should not be possible to demonitor
 3564:     %% before operation has succeeded...
 3565:     {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3566:     false = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]), %% Should be ignored by VM...
 3567:     receive
 3568:         {spawn_reply, R, ok, P} ->
 3569:             {monitors, [{process,P}]} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3570:             true = erlang:demonitor(R, [info]),
 3571:             {monitors, []} = process_info(self(), monitors),
 3572:             exit(P, kill)
 3573:     end,
 3574:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3575:     ok.
 3576: 
 3577: spawn_request_monitor_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3578:     %% Early child exit...
 3579:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3580:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [monitor, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3581:     receive
 3582:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3583:             receive
 3584:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3585:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3586:             end
 3587:     end,
 3588:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3589:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, monitor]),
 3590:     receive
 3591:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3592:             receive
 3593:                 {'DOWN', R2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3594:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3595:             end
 3596:     end,
 3597:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3598:     ok.
 3599: 
 3600: spawn_request_link_child_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3601:     %% Early child exit...
 3602:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3603:     Tag = {a, tag},
 3604:     R1 = spawn_request(nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [{reply_tag, Tag}, link]),
 3605:     receive
 3606:         {Tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3607:             receive
 3608:                 {'EXIT', P1, Reason1} ->
 3609:                     {undef, _} = Reason1
 3610:             end
 3611:     end,
 3612:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3613:     R2 = spawn_request(Node, nonexisting_module, nonexisting_function, [], [link, {reply_tag, Tag}]),
 3614:     receive
 3615:         {Tag, R2, ok, P2} ->
 3616:             receive
 3617:                 {'EXIT', P2, Reason2} ->
 3618:                     {undef, _} = Reason2
 3619:             end
 3620:     end,
 3621:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3622:     ok.
 3623: 
 3624: spawn_request_link_parent_exit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3625:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), false),
 3626:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3627:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, false),
 3628:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3629:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3630: 
 3631: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_compound_reason(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3632:     C1 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(node(), true),
 3633:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3634:     C2 = spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, true),
 3635:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3636:     {comment, C1 ++ " " ++ C2}.
 3637: 
 3638: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_test(Node, CompoundExitReason) ->
 3639:     %% Early parent exit...
 3640:     Tester = self(),
 3641: 
 3642:     ExitReason = if CompoundExitReason -> "kaboom";
 3643:                     true -> kaboom
 3644:                  end,
 3645: 
 3646:     verify_nc(node()),
 3647: 
 3648:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3649:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3650: 
 3651:     ParentFun = case node() == Node of
 3652:                     true ->
 3653:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3654:                                 spawn_request(?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3655:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3656:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3657:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3658:                         end;
 3659:                     false ->
 3660:                         fun (Wait) ->
 3661:                                 spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3662:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3663:                                               [Tester], [link,{priority,max}]),
 3664:                                 receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3665:                                 exit(ExitReason)
 3666:                         end
 3667:                 end,
 3668:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3669:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3670:                                             %% Give parent some work to do when
 3671:                                             %% exiting and by this increase
 3672:                                             %% possibilities for races...
 3673:                                             T = ets:new(x,[]),
 3674:                                             ets:insert(T, lists:map(fun (I) ->
 3675:                                                                             {I,I}
 3676:                                                                     end,
 3677:                                                                     lists:seq(1,10000))),
 3678:                                             ParentFun(N rem 10) end,
 3679:                                     [{priority, max}])
 3680:                   end,
 3681:                   lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 3682:     N = gather_parent_exits(ExitReason, false),
 3683:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3684:                     fun () ->
 3685:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3686:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3687:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3688:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3689:                                       end, processes())
 3690:                     end),
 3691:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3692:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3693:                       (_) ->
 3694:                           ok
 3695:                   end, CFs),
 3696:     Comment =
 3697:         "Got "
 3698:         ++ integer_to_list(N)
 3699:         ++ if node() == Node -> " node local";
 3700:                   true -> " node remote"
 3701:            end
 3702:         ++ if CompoundExitReason -> " \"kaboom\"";
 3703:               true -> " \'kaboom\'"
 3704:            end
 3705:         ++ " exits!",
 3706:     erlang:display(Comment),
 3707:     Comment.
 3708: 
 3709: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3710:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3711:     N = 1000,
 3712:     ExitCounter = spawn(Node, fun exit_counter/0),
 3713:     lists:foreach(fun (_) ->
 3714:                           spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node)
 3715:                   end,
 3716:                   lists:seq(1, N)),
 3717:     ResRef = make_ref(),
 3718:     ExitCounter ! {get_results, self(), ResRef},
 3719:     Cmnt = receive
 3720:                {ResRef, CntMap} ->
 3721:                    lists:flatten(
 3722:                      ["In total ", integer_to_list(N), " exits. ",
 3723:                       "Detected exits: ",
 3724:                       maps:fold(fun (ExitReason, Count, "") ->
 3725:                                         io_lib:format("~p exit ~p times",
 3726:                                                       [ExitReason, Count]);
 3727:                                     (ExitReason, Count, Acc) ->
 3728:                                         [Acc, io_lib:format("; ~p exit ~p times",
 3729:                                                             [ExitReason, Count])]
 3730:                                 end,
 3731:                                 "",
 3732:                                 CntMap),
 3733:                       "."])
 3734:            end,
 3735:     io:format("~s~n", [Cmnt]),
 3736:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3737:     {comment, Cmnt}.
 3738: 
 3739: exit_counter() ->
 3740:     true = register(exit_counter, self()),
 3741:     exit_counter(#{}).
 3742: 
 3743: exit_counter(CntMap) ->
 3744:     receive
 3745:         {get_results, From, Ref} ->
 3746:             From ! {Ref, CntMap};
 3747:         {exit, Reason} ->
 3748:             OldCnt = maps:get(Reason, CntMap, 0),
 3749:             exit_counter(CntMap#{Reason => OldCnt+1})
 3750:     end.
 3751: 
 3752: spawn_request_link_parent_exit_nodedown_test(Node) ->
 3753:     pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
 3754:     ChildFun = fun () ->
 3755:                        process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3756:                        receive
 3757:                            {'EXIT', _, Reason} ->
 3758:                                exit_counter ! {exit, Reason}
 3759:                        end
 3760:                end,
 3761:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 3762:                                        _ReqID = spawn_request(Node,
 3763:                                                               ChildFun,
 3764:                                                               [link,
 3765:                                                                {priority,max}]),
 3766:                                        exit(bye)
 3767:                                end),
 3768:     receive
 3769:         {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 3770:             bye = Reason,
 3771:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node)
 3772:     end,
 3773:     ok.
 3774:

 3776: spawn_request_abandon_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3777:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3778:     false = spawn_request_abandon(make_ref()),
 3779:     false = spawn_request_abandon(spawn_request(fun () -> ok end)),
 3780:     false = spawn_request_abandon(rpc:call(Node, erlang, make_ref, [])),
 3781:     try
 3782:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(self()) 
 3783:     catch
 3784:         error:badarg ->
 3785:             ok
 3786:     end,
 3787:     try
 3788:         noreturn = spawn_request_abandon(4711)
 3789:     catch
 3790:         error:badarg ->
 3791:             ok
 3792:     end,
 3793: 
 3794:     verify_nc(node()),
 3795: 
 3796:     %% Ensure code loaded on other node...
 3797:     _ = rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, module_info, []),
 3798: 
 3799: 
 3800:     TotOps = 1000,
 3801:     Tester = self(),
 3802: 
 3803:     ParentFun = fun (Wait, Opts) ->
 3804:                         ReqId = spawn_request(Node, ?MODULE,
 3805:                                               spawn_request_test_exit_child,
 3806:                                               [Tester], Opts),
 3807:                         receive after Wait -> ok end,
 3808:                         case spawn_request_abandon(ReqId) of
 3809:                             true ->
 3810:                                 ok;
 3811:                             false ->
 3812:                                 receive
 3813:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, _} ->
 3814:                                         exit(spawn_failed);
 3815:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, Pid} ->
 3816:                                         unlink(Pid),
 3817:                                         exit(Pid, bye)
 3818:                                 after
 3819:                                     0 ->
 3820:                                         exit(missing_spawn_reply)
 3821:                                 end
 3822:                         end
 3823:                 end,
 3824:     %% Parent exit early...
 3825:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3826:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3827:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link])
 3828:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3829:                   end,
 3830:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3831:     NoA1 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3832:     %% Parent exit late...
 3833:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3834:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3835:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [link]),
 3836:                                             receive
 3837:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3838:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3839:                                             after
 3840:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3841:                                             end
 3842:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3843:                   end,
 3844:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3845:     NoA2 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3846:     CFs = erpc:call(Node,
 3847:                     fun () ->
 3848:                             %% Ensure all children have had time to enter an exiting state...
 3849:                             receive after 100*test_server:timetrap_scale_factor() -> ok end,
 3850:                             lists:map(fun (P) ->
 3851:                                               {P, process_info(P, current_function)}
 3852:                                       end, processes())
 3853:                     end),
 3854:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, {current_function, {?MODULE, spawn_request_test_exit_child, 1}}}) ->
 3855:                           ct:fail({missing_exit_to_child_detected, P});
 3856:                       (_) ->
 3857:                           ok
 3858:                   end, CFs),
 3859:     %% Parent exit early...
 3860:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3861:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3862:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, [])
 3863:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3864:                   end,
 3865:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3866:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3867:     %% Parent exit late...
 3868:     lists:foreach(fun (N) ->
 3869:                           spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3870:                                             ParentFun(N rem 50, []),
 3871:                                             receive
 3872:                                                 {spawn_reply, _, _, _} ->
 3873:                                                     exit(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 3874:                                             after
 3875:                                                 1000 -> ok
 3876:                                             end
 3877:                                     end, [link,{priority,max}])
 3878:                   end,
 3879:                   lists:seq(1, TotOps)),
 3880:     0 = gather_parent_exits(abandoned, true),
 3881:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3882:     C = "Got " ++ integer_to_list(NoA1) ++ " and "
 3883:         ++ integer_to_list(NoA2) ++ " abandoneds of 2*"
 3884:         ++ integer_to_list(TotOps) ++ " ops!",
 3885:     true = NoA1 /= 0,
 3886:     true = NoA1 /= TotOps,
 3887:     true = NoA2 /= 0,
 3888:     true = NoA2 /= TotOps,
 3889:     {comment, C}.
 3890: 
 3891: spawn_request_test_exit_child(Tester) ->
 3892:   Child = self(),
 3893:   _ = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 3894:                         process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3895:                         receive
 3896:                             {'EXIT', Child, Reason} ->
 3897:                                 Tester ! {parent_exit, Reason}
 3898:                         end
 3899:                 end, [link,{priority,max}]),
 3900:   receive after infinity -> ok end.
 3901: 
 3902: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther) ->
 3903:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3904:     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, 0).
 3905: 
 3906: gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N) ->
 3907:     receive
 3908:         {parent_exit, Reason} ->
 3909:             gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N+1);
 3910:         {parent_exit, _} = ParentExit ->
 3911:             case AllowOther of
 3912:                 false ->
 3913:                     ct:fail(ParentExit);
 3914:                 true ->
 3915:                     gather_parent_exits(Reason, AllowOther, N)
 3916:             end
 3917:     after 0 ->
 3918:             N
 3919:     end.
 3920: dist_spawn_monitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3921:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 3922:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3923:     receive
 3924:         {spawn_reply, R1, ok, P1} ->
 3925:             receive
 3926:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, Reason1} ->
 3927:                     hej = Reason1
 3928:             end
 3929:     end,
 3930:     {P2, Mon2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 3931:     receive
 3932:         {'DOWN', Mon2, process, P2, Reason2} ->
 3933:             hej = Reason2
 3934:     end,
 3935:     {P3, Mon3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 3936:     receive
 3937:         {'DOWN', Mon3, process, P3, Reason3} ->
 3938:             hej = Reason3
 3939:     end,
 3940:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 3941:     ok.
 3942: 
 3943: spawn_against_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3944:     %% Spawn against an ei node which does not support spawn
 3945:     {ok, EiNode} = start_ei_node(Config),
 3946:     try
 3947:         %% First spawn triggering a new connection; which
 3948:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3949:         %% of spawn requests...
 3950:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3951:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, true),
 3952:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3953:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3954:         spawn_ei_node_test(EiNode, false),
 3955:         ok
 3956:     after
 3957:         ok = stop_ei_node(EiNode)
 3958:     end.
 3959: 
 3960: spawn_against_old_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3961:     %% Same spawn tests against a two releases old node as against
 3962:     %% ei node above
 3963:     OldRel = integer_to_list(list_to_integer(erlang:system_info(otp_release))-2),
 3964:     OldRelName = OldRel ++ "_latest",
 3965:     %% We clear all ERL_FLAGS for the old node as all options may not
 3966:     %% be supported.
 3967:     ClearEnv = lists:foldl(
 3968:                  fun({Key,_Value}, Acc) ->
 3969:                          case re:run(Key,"^ERL_.*FLAGS$") of
 3970:                              {match,_} ->
 3971:                                  [{Key,""}|Acc];
 3972:                              nomatch ->
 3973:                                  Acc
 3974:                          end
 3975:                  end, [], os:env()),
 3976:     case ?CT_PEER_REL(#{connection => 0, env => ClearEnv },
 3977:                       OldRelName,
 3978:                       proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config)) of
 3979: 	not_available ->
 3980:             {skipped, "No OTP "++OldRel++" available"};
 3981:         {ok, Peer, OldNode} ->
 3982:             try
 3983:                 %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 3984:                 %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 3985:                 %% of spawn requests...
 3986:                 io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 3987:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, true),
 3988:                 io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 3989:                 %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 3990:                 spawn_node_test(OldNode, false),
 3991:                 ok
 3992:             after
 3993:                 peer:stop(Peer)
 3994:             end
 3995:     end.
 3996: 
 3997: spawn_against_new_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3998:     {ok, Peer, CurrNode} = ?CT_PEER(#{connection => 0}),
 3999:     try
 4000:         %% Spawns triggering a new connection; which
 4001:         %% will trigger hopeful data transcoding
 4002:         %% of spawn requests...
 4003:         io:format("~n~nDoing initial connect tests...~n", []),
 4004:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, true),
 4005:         io:format("~n~nDoing already connected tests...~n", []),
 4006:         %% Spawns on an already existing connection...
 4007:         spawn_node_test(CurrNode, false),
 4008:         ok
 4009:     after
 4010:         peer:stop(Peer)
 4011:     end.
 4012: 
 4013: spawn_ei_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 4014:     io:format("Testing spawn_request() against ei node...", []),
 4015:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4016:     Ref1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 4017:     receive
 4018:         {a_tag, Ref1, Err, Notsup} ->
 4019:             error = Err,
 4020:             notsup = Notsup,
 4021:             ok
 4022:     end,
 4023:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor() against ei node...", []),
 4024:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4025:     try
 4026:         spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej])
 4027:     catch
 4028:         error:notsup ->
 4029:             ok
 4030:     end,
 4031:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor against ei node...", []),
 4032:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4033:     {P0, M0} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 4034:     receive
 4035:         {'DOWN', M0, process, P0, R0} ->
 4036:             notsup = R0
 4037:     end,
 4038:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link against ei node...", []),
 4039:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4040:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4041:     P1 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 4042:     receive
 4043:         {'EXIT', P1, R1} ->
 4044:             notsup = R1
 4045:     end,
 4046:     io:format("Testing spawn_link() against ei node...", []),
 4047:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4048:     P2 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 4049:     receive
 4050:         {'EXIT', P2, R2} ->
 4051:             notsup = R2
 4052:     end,
 4053:     ok.
 4054: 
 4055: disconnect_node(_Node, false) ->
 4056:     ok;
 4057: disconnect_node(Node, true) ->
 4058:     lists:member(Node, nodes([visible, hidden])) andalso begin
 4059:         monitor_node(Node, true),
 4060:         true = erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 4061:         receive {nodedown, Node} -> ok end
 4062:     end.
 4063: 
 4064: spawn_node_test(Node, Disconnect) ->
 4065:     io:format("Testing spawn_request()...", []),
 4066:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4067:     R1 = spawn_request(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor, {reply_tag, a_tag}]),
 4068:     receive
 4069:         {a_tag, R1, ok, P1} ->
 4070:             Node = node(P1),
 4071:             receive
 4072:                 {'DOWN', R1, process, P1, hej} -> ok
 4073:             end
 4074:     end,
 4075:     io:format("Testing spawn_monitor()...", []),
 4076:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4077:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 4078:     receive
 4079:         {'DOWN', M2, process, P2, hej} -> ok
 4080:     end,
 4081:     Node = node(P2),
 4082:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with monitor...", []),
 4083:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4084:     {P3, M3} = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [monitor]),
 4085:     receive
 4086:         {'DOWN', M3, process, P3, hej} -> ok
 4087:     end,
 4088:     Node = node(P3),
 4089:     io:format("Testing spawn_opt() with link...", []),
 4090:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4091:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 4092:     P4 = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, exit, [hej], [link]),
 4093:     Node = node(P4),
 4094:     receive
 4095:         {'EXIT', P4, hej} ->
 4096:             ok
 4097:     end,
 4098:     io:format("Testing spawn_link()...", []),
 4099:     disconnect_node(Node, Disconnect),
 4100:     P5 = spawn_link(Node, erlang, exit, [hej]),
 4101:     Node = node(P5),
 4102:     receive
 4103:         {'EXIT', P5, hej} ->
 4104:             ok
 4105:     end.
