 4107: spawn_request_reply_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4108:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(undefined, node()),
 4109:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 4110:     spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node).
 4111:     
 4112: spawn_request_reply_option_test(Peer, Node) ->
 4113:     io:format("Testing on node: ~p~n", [Node]),
 4114:     Parent = self(),
 4115:     Done1 = make_ref(),
 4116:     RID1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done1 end, [{reply, yes}]),
 4117:     receive Done1 -> ok end,
 4118:     receive
 4119:         {spawn_reply, RID1, ok, _} -> ok
 4120:     after 0 ->
 4121:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 4122:     end,
 4123:     Done2 = make_ref(),
 4124:     RID2 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done2 end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 4125:     receive Done2 -> ok end,
 4126:     receive
 4127:         {spawn_reply, RID2, ok, _} -> ok
 4128:     after 0 ->
 4129:             ct:fail(missing_spawn_reply)
 4130:     end,
 4131:     Done3 = make_ref(),
 4132:     RID3 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done3 end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 4133:     receive Done3 -> ok end,
 4134:     receive
 4135:         {spawn_reply, RID3, _, _} ->
 4136:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4137:     after 0 ->
 4138:             ok
 4139:     end,
 4140:     Done4 = make_ref(),
 4141:     RID4 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> Parent ! Done4 end, [{reply, no}]),
 4142:     receive Done4 -> ok end,
 4143:     receive
 4144:         {spawn_reply, RID4, _, _} ->
 4145:             ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4146:     after 0 ->
 4147:             ok
 4148:     end,
 4149:     RID5 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}, bad_option]),
 4150:     receive
 4151:         {spawn_reply, RID5, error, badopt} -> ok
 4152:     end,
 4153:     RID6 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}, bad_option]),
 4154:     receive
 4155:         {spawn_reply, RID6, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4156:     after 1000 -> ok
 4157:     end,
 4158:     RID7 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}, bad_option]),
 4159:     receive
 4160:         {spawn_reply, RID7, error, badopt} -> ok
 4161:     end,
 4162:     RID8 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}, bad_option]),
 4163:     receive
 4164:         {spawn_reply, RID8, error, badopt} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4165:     after 1000 -> ok
 4166:     end,
 4167:     RID8_1 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, nahh}]),
 4168:     receive
 4169:         {spawn_reply, RID8_1, error, badopt} -> ok
 4170:     end,
 4171:     case Node == node() of
 4172:         true ->
 4173:             ok;
 4174:         false ->
 4175:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 4176:             RID9 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, yes}]),
 4177:             receive
 4178:                 {spawn_reply, RID9, error, noconnection} -> ok
 4179:             end,
 4180:             RID10 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, success_only}]),
 4181:             receive
 4182:                 {spawn_reply, RID10, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4183:             after 1000 -> ok
 4184:             end,
 4185:             RID11 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, error_only}]),
 4186:             receive
 4187:                 {spawn_reply, RID11, error, noconnection} -> ok
 4188:             end,
 4189:             RID12 = spawn_request(Node, fun () -> ok end, [{reply, no}]),
 4190:             receive
 4191:                 {spawn_reply, RID12, error, noconnection} -> ct:fail(unexpected_spawn_reply)
 4192:             after 1000 -> ok
 4193:             end,
 4194:             ok
 4195:     end.
 4196: 
 4197: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4198:     %% A process newly spawned via the distribution is passed the
 4199:     %% argument list to use as the first message followed by an intialization
 4200:     %% message. Those two messages *must* be the first messages in its queue
 4201:     %% when it begins execution. The parallel receive/send signal optimization
 4202:     %% could potentially cause reordering of messages if certain future
 4203:     %% changes are made. This test case tries to cause a situation where a
 4204:     %% message reordering potentially could happen, and hopefully will detect
 4205:     %% such problematic changes.
 4206:     Tester = self(),
 4207:     NoScheds = 8,
 4208:     NoSchedsStr = integer_to_list(NoScheds),
 4209:     NoSchedsList = lists:seq(1, NoScheds),
 4210:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["+S"++NoSchedsStr++":"++NoSchedsStr]),
 4211:     AttackMsg = make_ref(),
 4212:     AttackArgList = [Tester, AttackMsg],
 4213:     OkMsg = make_ref(),
 4214:     As = lists:map(
 4215:            fun (_) ->
 4216:                    spawn_opt(
 4217:                      Node,
 4218:                      fun () ->
 4219:                              dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(AttackArgList,
 4220:                                                               1000)
 4221:                      end, [{priority, high}, link])
 4222:            end, NoSchedsList),
 4223:     Relay = spawn_opt(
 4224:               Node,
 4225:               fun () ->
 4226:                       receive
 4227:                           {attack, Victim} ->
 4228:                               lists:foreach(fun (A) ->
 4229:                                                     A ! {attack, Victim}
 4230:                                             end, As)
 4231:                       end
 4232:               end, [{priority, max}, link]),
 4233:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 4234:     Victim = spawn_opt(Node, erlang, send, [Tester, OkMsg],
 4235:                        [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4236:                         {priority, normal},
 4237:                         link]),
 4238:     Relay ! {attack, Victim},
 4239:     receive
 4240:         OkMsg ->
 4241:             ok;
 4242:         AttackMsg ->
 4243:             ct:fail(child_process_used_message_as_argument_list)
 4244:     end,
 4245:     lists:foreach(fun (P) ->
 4246:                           unlink(P)
 4247:                   end, [Victim] ++ [Relay] ++ As),
 4248:     peer:stop(Peer),
 4249:     ok.
 4250: 
 4251: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N) ->
 4252:     receive
 4253:         {attack, Victim} ->
 4254:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Victim, Msg, N)
 4255:     after
 4256:         0 ->
 4257:             dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Msg, N)
 4258:     end.
 4259: 
 4260: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(_Pid, _Msg, 0) ->
 4261:     ok;
 4262: dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N) ->
 4263:     Pid ! Msg,
 4264:     dist_spawn_arg_list_mixup_sender(Pid, Msg, N-1).
 4265: 
 4266: processes_term_proc_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4267:     Tester = self(),
 4268: 
 4269:     Run = fun(Args) ->
 4270:               {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
 4271:               RT = spawn_link(Node, fun () ->
 4272:                               receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4273:                               as_expected = processes_term_proc_list_test(false),
 4274:                               Tester ! {it_worked, self()}
 4275:                       end),
 4276:               receive {it_worked, RT} -> ok end,
 4277:               stop_node(Peer, Node)
 4278:           end,
 4279: 
 4280:     %% We have to run this test case with +S1 since instrument:allocations()
 4281:     %% will report a free()'d block as present until it's actually deallocated
 4282:     %% by its employer.
 4283:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "false", "+S1"]),
 4284:     Run(["+MSe", "true", "+Muatags", "true", "+S1"]),
 4285: 
 4286:     ok.
 4287: 
 4288: %% OTP-18322: Send msg to spawning process pid returned from processes/0
 4289: processes_send_infant(_Config) ->
 4290:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of
 4291:         1 ->
 4292:             {skip, "Only one scheduler online"};
 4293:         NScheds ->
 4294:             processes_send_infant_do(NScheds)
 4295:     end.
 4296: 
 4297: processes_send_infant_do(NScheds) ->
 4298:     IgnoreList = erlang:processes(),
 4299:     IgnorePids = maps:from_keys(IgnoreList, ignore),
 4300:     Tester = self(),
 4301: 
 4302:     %% To provoke bug we need sender and spawner on different schedulers.
 4303:     %% Let spawners use schedulers nr 2 to NScheds
 4304:     NSpawnerScheds = NScheds - 1,
 4305:     NSpawners = 2 * NSpawnerScheds,
 4306:     [spawn_link(fun() ->
 4307:                         processes_send_infant_spawner((I rem  NSpawnerScheds) + 2,
 4308:                                                       Tester, Tester, 1)
 4309:                 end)
 4310:      || I <- lists:seq(0, NSpawners-1)],
 4311: 
 4312:     %% and make sure sender use scheduler 1
 4313:     {Sender,SenderMon} =
 4314:         spawn_opt(
 4315:           fun() ->
 4316:                   timeout = processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4317:           end,
 4318:           [link, monitor, {scheduler,1}]),
 4319: 
 4320:     %% Run test for a little while and see if VM crashes
 4321:     {ok, _TRef} = timer:send_after(1000, Sender, timeout),
 4322:     {'DOWN', SenderMon, process, Sender, normal} = receive_any(),
 4323: 
 4324:     %% Stop spawners and collect stats
 4325:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4326:                                     {processes_send_infant, stop},
 4327:                                     IgnorePids),
 4328:     {TotSpawn, TheLastOfUs} =
 4329:         lists:foldl(fun(_, {SpawnCnt, Pids}) ->
 4330:                             {Pid, Generation} = receive_any(),
 4331:                             io:format("Got ~p from ~p\n", [Generation, Pid]),
 4332:                             {SpawnCnt+Generation, [Pid | Pids]}
 4333:                     end,
 4334:                     {0, []},
 4335:                     lists:seq(1, NSpawners)),
 4336:     io:format("Total spawned processes: ~p\n", [TotSpawn]),
 4337:     Aliens = (erlang:processes() -- IgnoreList) -- TheLastOfUs,
 4338:     io:format("Alien processes: ~p\n", [Aliens]),
 4339:     ok.
 4340: 
 4341: 
 4342: 
 4343: processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids) ->
 4344:     %% Send message identifying this test case, in case we send
 4345:     %% to alien processes spawned during the test.
 4346:     Msg = processes_send_infant,
 4347:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(erlang:processes(),
 4348:                                     Msg,
 4349:                                     IgnorePids),
 4350:     receive timeout -> timeout
 4351:     after 0 ->
 4352:             processes_send_infant_loop(IgnorePids)
 4353:     end.
 4354: 
 4355: processes_send_infant_broadcast([Pid | Tail], Msg, IgnorePids) ->
 4356:     case maps:is_key(Pid, IgnorePids) of
 4357:         false ->
 4358:             Pid ! Msg;
 4359:         true ->
 4360:             ignore
 4361:     end,
 4362:     processes_send_infant_broadcast(Tail, Msg, IgnorePids);
 4363: processes_send_infant_broadcast([], _, _) ->
 4364:     ok.
 4365: 
 4366: processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester, Parent, Generation) ->
 4367:     link(Tester),
 4368:     case receive_any() of
 4369:         processes_send_infant ->
 4370:             case Parent of
 4371:                 Tester -> ok;
 4372:                 _ -> Parent ! {die, self()}
 4373:             end,
 4374:             Self = self(),
 4375:             Child = spawn_opt(fun() ->
 4376:                                       processes_send_infant_spawner(Sched, Tester,
 4377:                                                                     Self,
 4378:                                                                     Generation+1)
 4379:                               end,
 4380:                              [{message_queue_data, off_heap},
 4381:                               {scheduler, Sched}]),
 4382:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4383: 
 4384:         {processes_send_infant, stop} ->
 4385:             Tester ! {self(), Generation}
 4386:     end.
 4387: 
 4388: process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child) ->
 4389:     %% Parent stays alive only to ensure child gets stop message
 4390:     case receive_any() of
 4391:         processes_send_infant ->
 4392:             process_send_infant_spawner_epilogue(Child);
 4393:         {die, Child} ->
 4394:             ok;
 4395:         {processes_send_infant, stop}=Stop ->
 4396:             %% We are not sure child was spawned when stop message was sent
 4397:             %% so we relay it.
 4398:             Child ! Stop
 4399:     end.
 4400: 
 4401: 
 4402: -define(CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MC, XB),
 4403: 	chk_term_proc_list(?LINE, MC, XB)).
 4404: 
 4405: chk_term_proc_list(Line, MustChk, ExpectBlks) ->
 4406:     Allocs = instrument:allocations(),
 4407:     case {MustChk, Allocs} of
 4408: 	{false, {error, not_enabled}} ->
 4409: 	    not_enabled;
 4410: 	{false, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} when ByOrigin =:= #{} ->
 4411: 	    not_enabled;
 4412: 	{_, {ok, {_Shift, _Unscanned, ByOrigin}}} ->
 4413:             ByType = maps:get(system, ByOrigin, #{}),
 4414:             Hist = maps:get(ptab_list_deleted_el, ByType, {}),
 4415: 	    case lists:sum(tuple_to_list(Hist)) of
 4416: 		ExpectBlks ->
 4417:                     ok;
 4418: 		Blks ->
 4419:                     exit({line, Line, mismatch,
 4420:                           expected, ExpectBlks,
 4421:                           actual, Blks})
 4422: 	    end
 4423:     end,
 4424:     ok.
 4425: 
 4426: processes_term_proc_list_test(MustChk) ->
 4427:     Tester = self(),
 4428:     enable_internal_state(),
 4429:     PBInfo = erts_debug:get_internal_state(processes_bif_info),
 4430:     print_processes_bif_info(PBInfo),
 4431:     WantReds = PBInfo#ptab_list_bif_info.min_start_reds + 10,
 4432:     #ptab_list_bif_info{tab_chunks = Chunks,
 4433: 	tab_chunks_size = ChunksSize,
 4434: 	tab_indices_per_red = IndiciesPerRed
 4435:     } = PBInfo,
 4436:     true = Chunks > 1,
 4437:     true = Chunks*ChunksSize >= IndiciesPerRed*WantReds,
 4438:     Processes = fun () ->
 4439: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(reds_left,
 4440: 		WantReds),
 4441: 	    processes()
 4442:     end,
 4443:     Exit = fun (P) ->
 4444: 	    unlink(P),
 4445: 	    exit(P, bang),
 4446: 	    wait_until(
 4447: 		fun () ->
 4448: 			not lists:member(
 4449: 			    P,
 4450: 			    erts_debug:get_internal_state(
 4451: 				processes))
 4452: 		end)
 4453:     end,
 4454:     SpawnSuspendProcessesProc = fun () ->
 4455: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4456: 		  P = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4457: 					 Tester ! {suspend_me, self()},
 4458: 					 Tester ! {self(),
 4459: 						   done,
 4460: 						   hd(Processes())},
 4461: 					 receive after infinity -> ok end
 4462: 				 end),
 4463: 		  receive {suspend_me, P} -> ok end,
 4464: 		  erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4465: 		  erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4466: 		  [{status,suspended},
 4467: 		   {current_function,{erlang,ptab_list_continue,2}}]
 4468: 		      = process_info(P, [status, current_function]),
 4469: 		  P
 4470: 	  end,
 4471:     ResumeProcessesProc = fun (P) ->
 4472: 					erlang:resume_process(P),
 4473: 					receive {P, done, _} -> ok end
 4474: 				end,
 4475:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4476:     HangAround = fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4477:     HA1 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4478:     HA2 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4479:     HA3 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4480:     S1 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4481:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4482:     Exit(HA1),
 4483:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4484:     S2 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4485:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4486:     S3 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4487:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4488:     Exit(HA2),
 4489:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4490:     S4 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4491:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4492:     Exit(HA3),
 4493:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4494:     ResumeProcessesProc(S1),
 4495:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4496:     ResumeProcessesProc(S3),
 4497:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4498:     ResumeProcessesProc(S4),
 4499:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4500:     ResumeProcessesProc(S2),
 4501:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4502:     Exit(S1),
 4503:     Exit(S2),
 4504:     Exit(S3),
 4505:     Exit(S4),
 4506: 
 4507: 
 4508:     HA4 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4509:     HA5 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4510:     HA6 = spawn_link(HangAround),
 4511:     S5 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4512:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 1),
 4513:     Exit(HA4),
 4514:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 2),
 4515:     S6 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4516:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 3),
 4517:     Exit(HA5),
 4518:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 4),
 4519:     S7 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4520:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 5),
 4521:     Exit(HA6),
 4522:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4523:     S8 = SpawnSuspendProcessesProc(),
 4524:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4525: 
 4526:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, block_normal),
 4527:     Exit(S8),
 4528:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 7),
 4529:     Exit(S5),
 4530:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4531:     Exit(S7),
 4532:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 6),
 4533:     Exit(S6),
 4534:     ?CHK_TERM_PROC_LIST(MustChk, 0),
 4535:     erlang:system_flag(multi_scheduling, unblock_normal),
 4536:     as_expected.
 4537: 
 4538: 
 4539: otp_7738_waiting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4540:     otp_7738_test(waiting).
 4541: 
 4542: otp_7738_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4543:     otp_7738_test(suspended).
 4544: 
 4545: otp_7738_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4546:     otp_7738_test(resume).
 4547: 
 4548: otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4549:     sys_mem_cond_run(3072, fun () -> do_otp_7738_test(Type) end).
 4550: 
 4551: do_otp_7738_test(Type) ->
 4552:     T = self(),
 4553:     S = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4554: 		receive
 4555: 		    {suspend, Suspendee} ->
 4556: 			erlang:suspend_process(Suspendee),
 4557: 			T ! {suspended, Suspendee},
 4558: 			receive
 4559: 			after 10 ->
 4560: 				erlang:resume_process(Suspendee),
 4561: 				Suspendee ! wake_up
 4562: 			end;
 4563: 		    {send, To, Msg} ->
 4564: 			receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4565: 			To ! Msg
 4566: 		end
 4567: 	end),
 4568:     R = spawn_link(fun () ->
 4569: 		X = lists:seq(1, 20000000),
 4570: 		T ! {initialized, self()},
 4571: 		case Type of
 4572: 		    _ when Type == suspended;
 4573: 		Type == waiting ->
 4574: 		    receive _ -> ok end;
 4575: 		_ when Type == resume ->
 4576: 		    Receive = fun (F) ->
 4577: 			    receive
 4578: 				_ ->
 4579: 				    ok
 4580: 			    after 0 ->
 4581: 				    F(F)
 4582: 			    end
 4583: 		    end,
 4584: 		    Receive(Receive)
 4585: 	    end,
 4586: 	    T ! {woke_up, self()},
 4587: 	    id(X)
 4588:     end),
 4589:     receive {initialized, R} -> ok end,
 4590:     receive after 10 -> ok end,
 4591:     case Type of
 4592: 	      suspended ->
 4593: 		  erlang:suspend_process(R),
 4594: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4595: 	      waiting ->
 4596: 		  S ! {send, R, wake_up};
 4597: 	      resume ->
 4598: 		  S ! {suspend, R},
 4599: 		  receive {suspended, R} -> ok end
 4600: 	  end,
 4601:     erlang:garbage_collect(R),
 4602:     case Type of
 4603: 	      suspended ->
 4604: 		  erlang:resume_process(R);
 4605: 	      _ ->
 4606: 		  ok
 4607: 	  end,
 4608:     receive
 4609: 	      {woke_up, R} ->
 4610: 		  ok
 4611: 	  after 2000 ->
 4612: 		  I = process_info(R, [status, message_queue_len]),
 4613: 		  io:format("~p~n", [I]),
 4614: 		  ct:fail(no_progress)
 4615: 	  end,
 4616:     ok.
 4617: 
 4618: gor(Reds, Stop) ->
 4619:     receive
 4620: 	drop_me ->
 4621: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);	    
 4622: 	{From, reds} ->
 4623: 	    From ! {reds, Reds, self()},
 4624: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop);
 4625: 	{From, Stop} ->
 4626: 	    From ! {stopped, Stop, Reds, self()}
 4627:     after 0 ->
 4628: 	    gor(Reds+1, Stop)
 4629:     end.
 4630: 
 4631: garb_other_running(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4632:     Stop = make_ref(),
 4633:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(fun () -> gor(0, Stop) end),
 4634:     Reds = lists:foldl(fun (N, OldReds) ->
 4635: 			             case N rem 2 of
 4636: 					 0 -> Pid ! drop_me;
 4637: 					 _ -> ok
 4638: 				     end,
 4639: 				     erlang:garbage_collect(Pid),
 4640: 				     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4641: 				     Pid ! {self(), reds},
 4642: 				     receive
 4643: 					       {reds, NewReds, Pid} ->
 4644: 						   true = (NewReds > OldReds),
 4645: 						   NewReds
 4646: 					   end
 4647: 			     end,
 4648: 			     0,
 4649: 			     lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4650:     receive after 1 -> ok end,
 4651:     Pid ! {self(), Stop},
 4652:     receive
 4653: 	      {stopped, Stop, StopReds, Pid} ->
 4654: 		  true = (StopReds > Reds)
 4655: 	  end,
 4656:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, normal} -> ok end,
 4657:     ok.
 4658: 
 4659: no_priority_inversion(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4660:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4661:     Master = self(),
 4662:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4663:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4664: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4665:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4666: 					       tok_loop()
 4667: 				       end,
 4668: 				       [{priority, high},
 4669:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4670:                                         monitor,
 4671:                                         link])
 4672: 		     end,
 4673: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4674:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, HTLs),
 4675:     LTL = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4676: 			    tok_loop()
 4677: 		    end,
 4678: 		    [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4679:     false = erlang:check_process_code(element(1, LTL), nonexisting_module),
 4680:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(element(1, LTL)),
 4681:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4682: 			  unlink(P),
 4683: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4684: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4685:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4686: 			  receive
 4687: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4688: 				  ok
 4689: 			  end
 4690: 		  end, [LTL | HTLs]),
 4691:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4692:     ok.
 4693: 
 4694: no_priority_inversion2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4695:     Prio = process_flag(priority, max),
 4696:     Master = self(),
 4697:     Executing = make_ref(),
 4698:     MTLs = lists:map(fun (Sched) ->
 4699: 			     spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4700:                                                Master ! {self(), Executing},
 4701: 					       tok_loop()
 4702: 				       end,
 4703: 				       [{priority, max},
 4704:                                         {scheduler, Sched},
 4705:                                         monitor, link])
 4706: 		     end,
 4707: 		     lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers_online))),
 4708:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) -> receive {P,Executing} -> ok end end, MTLs),
 4709:     {PL, ML} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4710: 			       tok_loop()
 4711: 		       end,
 4712: 		       [{priority, low}, monitor, link]),
 4713:     RL = request_test(PL, low),
 4714:     RN = request_test(PL, normal),
 4715:     RH = request_test(PL, high),
 4716:     receive
 4717: 	{system_task_test, _, _} ->
 4718: 	    ct:fail(unexpected_system_task_completed)
 4719:     after 1000 ->
 4720: 	    ok
 4721:     end,
 4722:     RM = request_test(PL, max),
 4723:     receive
 4724: 	{system_task_test, RM, true} ->
 4725: 	    ok
 4726:     end,
 4727:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, _}) ->
 4728: 			  unlink(P),
 4729: 			  exit(P, kill)
 4730: 		  end, MTLs),
 4731:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4732: 			  receive
 4733: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4734: 				  ok
 4735: 			  end
 4736: 		  end, MTLs),
 4737:     receive
 4738: 	{system_task_test, RH, true} ->
 4739: 	    ok
 4740:     end,
 4741:     receive
 4742: 	{system_task_test, RN, true} ->
 4743: 	    ok
 4744:     end,
 4745:     receive
 4746: 	{system_task_test, RL, true} ->
 4747: 	    ok
 4748:     end,
 4749:     unlink(PL),
 4750:     exit(PL, kill),
 4751:     receive
 4752: 	{'DOWN', ML, process, PL, killed} ->
 4753: 	    ok
 4754:     end,
 4755:     process_flag(priority, Prio),
 4756:     ok.
 4757: 
 4758: request_test(Pid, Prio) ->
 4759:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4760:     erts_internal:request_system_task(Pid, Prio, {system_task_test, Ref}),
 4761:     Ref.
 4762: 
 4763: system_task_blast(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4764:     Me = self(),
 4765:     GCReq = fun () ->
 4766: 		    RL = test_req(Me, 100),
 4767: 		    lists:foreach(fun (R) ->
 4768: 					  receive
 4769: 					      {system_task_test, R, true} ->
 4770: 						  ok
 4771: 					  end
 4772: 				  end, RL),
 4773: 		    exit(it_worked)
 4774: 	    end,
 4775:     HTLs = lists:map(fun (_) -> spawn_monitor(GCReq) end, lists:seq(1, 1000)),
 4776:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 4777: 			  receive
 4778: 			      {'DOWN', M, process, P, it_worked} ->
 4779: 				  ok
 4780: 			  end
 4781: 		  end, HTLs),
 4782:     ok.
 4783: 
 4784: test_req(_Pid, 0) ->
 4785:     [];
 4786: test_req(Pid, N) ->
 4787:     R0 = request_test(Pid, low),
 4788:     R1 = request_test(Pid, normal),
 4789:     R2 = request_test(Pid, high),
 4790:     R3 = request_test(Pid, max),
 4791:     [R0, R1, R2, R3 | test_req(Pid, N-1)].
 4792: 
 4793: system_task_on_suspended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4794:     {P, M} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 4795: 				   tok_loop()
 4796: 			   end),
 4797:     true = erlang:suspend_process(P),
 4798:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4799:     true = erlang:garbage_collect(P),
 4800:     {status, suspended} = process_info(P, status),
 4801:     true = erlang:resume_process(P),
 4802:     false = ({status, suspended} == process_info(P, status)),
 4803:     exit(P, kill),
 4804:     receive
 4805: 	{'DOWN', M, process, P, killed} ->
 4806: 	    ok
 4807:     end.
 4808: 
 4809: %% When a system task couldn't be enqueued due to the process being in an
 4810: %% incompatible state, it would linger in the system task list and get executed
 4811: %% anyway the next time the process was scheduled. This would result in a
 4812: %% double-free at best.
 4813: %%
 4814: %% This test continuously purges modules while other processes run dirty code,
 4815: %% which will provoke this error as ERTS_PSTT_CPC can't be enqueued while a
 4816: %% process is running dirty code.
 4817: system_task_failed_enqueue(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4818:     case erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers) of
 4819:         N when N > 0 ->
 4820:             system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config);
 4821:         _ ->
 4822:             {skipped, "No dirty scheduler support"}
 4823:     end.
 4824: 
 4825: system_task_failed_enqueue_1(Config) ->
 4826:     Priv = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 4827: 
 4828:     Purgers = [spawn_link(fun() -> purge_loop(Priv, Id) end)
 4829:                || Id <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(schedulers))],
 4830:     Hogs = [spawn_link(fun() -> dirty_loop() end)
 4831:             || _ <- lists:seq(1, erlang:system_info(dirty_cpu_schedulers))],
 4832: 
 4833:     ct:sleep(5000),
 4834: 
 4835:     [begin
 4836:          unlink(Pid),
 4837:          exit(Pid, kill)
 4838:      end || Pid <- (Purgers ++ Hogs)],
 4839: 
 4840:     ok.
 4841: 
 4842: purge_loop(PrivDir, Id) ->
 4843:     Mod = "failed_enq_" ++ integer_to_list(Id),
 4844:     Path = PrivDir ++ "/" ++ Mod,
 4845:     file:write_file(Path ++ ".erl",
 4846:                     "-module('" ++ Mod ++ "').\n" ++
 4847:                         "-export([t/0]).\n" ++
 4848:                         "t() -> ok."),
 4849:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4850: purge_loop_1(Path) ->
 4851:     {ok, Mod} = compile:file(Path, []),
 4852:     erlang:delete_module(Mod),
 4853:     erts_code_purger:purge(Mod),
 4854:     purge_loop_1(Path).
 4855: 
 4856: dirty_loop() ->
 4857:     ok = erts_debug:dirty_cpu(reschedule, 10000),
 4858:     dirty_loop().
 4859: 
 4860: gc_request_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4861:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4862:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ref),
 4863:     gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(immed),
 4864:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS).
 4865: 
 4866: gc_request_when_gc_disabled_do(ReqIdType) ->
 4867:     Master = self(),
 4868:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4869: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4870: 								    false),
 4871: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4872: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4873: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, true},
 4874: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4875: 								     true),
 4876: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4877: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4878:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4879:     ReqId = case ReqIdType of
 4880:                 ref -> make_ref();
 4881:                 immed -> immed
 4882:             end,
 4883:     async = garbage_collect(P, [{async, ReqId}]),
 4884:     receive
 4885: 	{garbage_collect, ReqId, Result} ->
 4886: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_gc, Result});
 4887: 	{P, gc_state, true} ->
 4888: 	    ok
 4889:     end,
 4890:     receive {garbage_collect, ReqId, true} -> ok end,
 4891:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4892:     ok.
 4893: 
 4894: gc_request_blast_when_gc_disabled(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4895:     Master = self(),
 4896:     AIS = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
 4897:     {P, M} = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4898: 			       true = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4899: 								    false),
 4900: 			       Master ! {self(), gc_state, false},
 4901: 			       receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 4902: 			       false = erts_debug:set_internal_state(gc_state,
 4903: 								     true),
 4904: 			       receive after 100 -> ok end
 4905: 		       end, [monitor, link]),
 4906:     receive {P, gc_state, false} -> ok end,
 4907:     PMs = lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4908: 			    Prio = case N rem 4 of
 4909: 				       0 -> max;
 4910: 				       1 -> high;
 4911: 				       2 -> normal;
 4912: 				       3 -> low
 4913: 				   end,
 4914: 			    spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4915: 					      erlang:garbage_collect(P)
 4916: 				      end, [monitor, link, {priority, Prio}])
 4917: 		    end, lists:seq(1, 10000)),
 4918:     lists:foreach(fun ({Proc, Mon}) ->
 4919: 			  receive
 4920: 			      {'DOWN', Mon, process, Proc, normal} ->
 4921: 				  ok
 4922: 			  end
 4923: 		  end,
 4924: 		  PMs),
 4925:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, AIS),
 4926:     receive {'DOWN', M, process, P, _Reason} -> ok end,
 4927:     ok.
 4928: 
 4929: otp_16436(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4930:     P = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 4931:                           erts_debug:dirty_io(wait, 1000)
 4932:                   end,
 4933:                   [{priority,high},link]),
 4934:     erlang:check_process_code(P, non_existing),
 4935:     unlink(P),
 4936:     exit(P, kill),
 4937:     ok.
 4938: 
 4939: otp_16642(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4940:     %%
 4941:     %% Whitebox testing...
 4942:     %%
 4943:     %% Ensure that low prio system tasks are interleaved with
 4944:     %% normal prio system tasks as they should.
 4945:     %%
 4946:     process_flag(priority, high),
 4947:     process_flag(scheduler, 1),
 4948:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 4949:                     [link, {scheduler, 1}]),
 4950:     ReqSTasks = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4951:                         lists:foreach(
 4952:                           fun (N) ->
 4953:                                   erts_internal:request_system_task(
 4954:                                     Pid,
 4955:                                     Prio,
 4956:                                     {system_task_test,
 4957:                                      {Prio, N}})
 4958:                           end,
 4959:                           lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4960:                 end,
 4961:     MkResList = fun (Prio, Start, Stop) ->
 4962:                         lists:map(fun (N) ->
 4963:                                           {system_task_test,
 4964:                                            {Prio, N},
 4965:                                            true}
 4966:                                   end,
 4967:                                   lists:seq(Start, Stop))
 4968:                 end,
 4969: 
 4970:     %%% Test when normal queue clears first...
 4971: 
 4972:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 4973:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 10),
 4974:     ReqSTasks(low, 2, 4),
 4975:     ReqSTasks(normal, 11, 26),
 4976: 
 4977:     Msgs1 = recv_msgs(32),
 4978:     io:format("Got test 1 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs1]),
 4979: 
 4980:     ExpMsgs1 =
 4981:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 4982:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 4983:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 4984:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 4985:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 23)
 4986:         ++ MkResList(low, 2, 2)
 4987:         ++ MkResList(normal, 24, 26)
 4988:         ++ MkResList(low, 3, 4),
 4989:     
 4990:     case Msgs1 =:= ExpMsgs1 of
 4991:         true ->
 4992:             ok;
 4993:         false ->
 4994:             io:format("Expected test 1 messages ~p~n",
 4995:                       [ExpMsgs1]),
 4996:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 4997:     end,
 4998: 
 4999:     receive Unexp1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp1})
 5000:     after 500 -> ok
 5001:     end,
 5002: 
 5003:     io:format("Test 1 as expected~n", []),
 5004: 
 5005:     %%% Test when low queue clears first...
 5006: 
 5007:     ReqSTasks(low, 0, 1),
 5008:     ReqSTasks(normal, 0, 20),
 5009: 
 5010:     Msgs2 = recv_msgs(23),
 5011:     io:format("Got test 2 messages: ~p~n", [Msgs2]),
 5012: 
 5013:     ExpMsgs2 =
 5014:         MkResList(normal, 0, 7)
 5015:         ++ MkResList(low, 0, 0)
 5016:         ++ MkResList(normal, 8, 15)
 5017:         ++ MkResList(low, 1, 1)
 5018:         ++ MkResList(normal, 16, 20),
 5019:     
 5020:     case Msgs2 =:= ExpMsgs2 of
 5021:         true ->
 5022:             ok;
 5023:         false ->
 5024:             io:format("Expected test 2 messages ~p~n",
 5025:                       [ExpMsgs2]),
 5026:             ct:fail(unexpected_messages)
 5027:     end,
 5028: 
 5029:     receive Unexp2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message, Unexp2})
 5030:     after 500 -> ok
 5031:     end,
 5032: 
 5033:     io:format("Test 2 as expected~n", []),
 5034: 
 5035:     unlink(Pid),
 5036:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5037:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 5038:     ok.
 5039: 
 5040: alias_bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5041:     alias_bif_test(node()),
 5042:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5043:     alias_bif_test(Node),
 5044:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5045:     ok.
 5046: 
 5047: alias_bif_test(Node) ->
 5048:     A1 = alias(),
 5049:     {P1, M1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5050:                              fun () ->
 5051:                                      A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5052:                                      A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5053:                                      [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5054:                                      A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5055:                                      A1 ! {A1, 4}
 5056:                              end),
 5057:     [{A1,1},{A1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5058:     unalias(A1),
 5059:     P1 ! {A1, continue},
 5060:     [{'DOWN', M1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5061: 
 5062:     A2 = alias([explicit_unalias]),
 5063:     {P2, M2} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5064:                              fun () ->
 5065:                                      A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5066:                                      A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5067:                                      [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5068:                                      A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5069:                                      A2 ! {A2, 4}
 5070:                              end),
 5071:     [{A2,1},{A2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5072:     unalias(A2),
 5073:     P2 ! {A2, continue},
 5074:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5075:     
 5076:     A3 = alias([reply]),
 5077:     {_P3, M3} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5078:                               fun () ->
 5079:                                       A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5080:                                       A3 ! {A3, 2},
 5081:                                       A3 ! {A3, 3},
 5082:                                       A3 ! {A3, 4}
 5083:                               end),
 5084:     [{A3,1},{'DOWN', M3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5085:     ok.
 5086: 
 5087: dist_frag_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5088:     Tester = self(),
 5089:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5090:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5091:                           fun () ->
 5092:                                   Alias = alias(),
 5093:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 5094:                                   receive
 5095:                                       {data, Data} ->
 5096:                                           garbage_collect(),
 5097:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data}
 5098:                                   end,
 5099:                                   exit(end_of_test)
 5100:                           end),
 5101:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 5102:     receive
 5103:         {alias, Alias} ->
 5104:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5105:             receive
 5106:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 5107:                     Data = RecvData;
 5108:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 5109:                     ct:fail(R2)
 5110:             end;
 5111:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 5112:             ct:fail(R1)
 5113:     end,
 5114:     receive
 5115:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 5116:             end_of_test = R3
 5117:     end,
 5118:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5119:     ok.
 5120: 
 5121: dist_frag_unaliased(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5122:     %% Leak fixed by PR-7915 would have been detected using asan or valgrind
 5123:     %% when running this test...
 5124:     Tester = self(),
 5125:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5126:     {P,M} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5127:                           fun () ->
 5128:                                   Alias = alias(),
 5129:                                   Tester ! {alias, Alias},
 5130:                                   receive
 5131:                                       {data, Data} ->
 5132:                                           garbage_collect(),
 5133:                                           unalias(Alias),
 5134:                                           Tester ! {received_data, Data},
 5135:                                           receive
 5136:                                               {data, _Data} ->
 5137:                                                   exit(received_data_again);
 5138:                                               end_of_test ->
 5139:                                                   exit(end_of_test)
 5140:                                           end
 5141:                                   end
 5142:                           end),
 5143:     Data = term_to_binary(lists:seq(1, 1000000)),
 5144:     receive
 5145:         {alias, Alias} ->
 5146:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5147:             receive
 5148:                 {received_data, RecvData} ->
 5149:                     Data = RecvData;
 5150:                 {'DOWN', M, process, P, R2} ->
 5151:                     ct:fail(R2)
 5152:             end,
 5153:             Alias ! {data, Data},
 5154:             P ! end_of_test;
 5155:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R1} ->
 5156:             ct:fail(R1)
 5157:     end,
 5158:     receive
 5159:         {'DOWN', M, process, P, R3} ->
 5160:             end_of_test = R3
 5161:     end,
 5162:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5163:     ok.
 5164: 
 5165: monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5166:     monitor_alias_test(node()),
 5167:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5168:     monitor_alias_test(Node),
 5169:     stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5170:     ok.
 5171: 
 5172: monitor_alias_test(Node) ->
 5173:     P1 = spawn(Node,
 5174:                fun () ->
 5175:                        [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5176:                        A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5177:                        A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5178:                        [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5179:                        A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5180:                        A1 ! {A1, 4}
 5181:                end),
 5182:     MA1 = monitor(process, P1, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5183:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 5184:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5185:     unalias(MA1),
 5186:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 5187:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5188: 
 5189:     P2 = spawn(Node,
 5190:                fun () ->
 5191:                        [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5192:                        A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5193:                        A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5194:                        [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5195:                        A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5196:                        A2 ! {A2, 4}
 5197:                end),
 5198:     MA2 = monitor(process, P2, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 5199:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 5200:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5201:     demonitor(MA2),
 5202:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 5203:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 5204:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5205: 
 5206:     P3 = spawn(Node,
 5207:                fun () ->
 5208:                        [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5209:                        A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5210:                        A3 ! {A3, 2}
 5211:                end),
 5212:     MA3 = monitor(process, P3, [{alias, demonitor}]),
 5213:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5214:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5215:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5216:                                   fun () ->
 5217:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5218:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4}
 5219:                                   end),
 5220:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5221:     
 5222:     P4 = spawn(Node,
 5223:                fun () ->
 5224:                        [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1)
 5225:                end),
 5226:     MA4 = monitor(process, P4, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 5227:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5228:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5229:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5230:                                   fun () ->
 5231:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5232:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4}
 5233:                                   end),
 5234:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5235: 
 5236:     P5 = spawn(Node,
 5237:                fun () ->
 5238:                        [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5239:                        A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5240:                        A5 ! {A5, 2}
 5241:                end),
 5242:     MA5 = monitor(process, P5, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]),
 5243:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5244:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5245:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5246: 
 5247:     ok.
 5248:     
 5249: 
 5250: spawn_monitor_alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5251:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5252:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons.
 5253:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, normal),
 5254:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5255:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, normal),
 5256:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5257:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5258:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, normal),
 5259:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5260:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref()),
 5261:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5262:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_request, normal),
 5263:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5264:     spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_request, make_ref()),
 5265:     ok.
 5266: 
 5267: spawn_monitor_alias_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, ExitReason) ->
 5268:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5269:                 spawn_opt ->
 5270:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5271:                             try
 5272:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5273:                             catch
 5274:                                 error:Err ->
 5275:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5276:                             end
 5277:                     end;
 5278:                 spawn_request ->
 5279:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5280:                             try
 5281:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5282:                                 receive
 5283:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5284:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5285:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5286:                                         error(Error)
 5287:                                 end
 5288:                             catch
 5289:                                 error:Err ->
 5290:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5291:                             end
 5292:                     end
 5293:             end,
 5294: 
 5295:     SpawnError = fun (OptList) ->
 5296:                          try
 5297:                              Spawn(fun () -> ok end, OptList),
 5298:                              error(ignored_error)
 5299:                          catch
 5300:                              error:{SpawnType, badarg} when SpawnType == spawn_opt ->
 5301:                                  ok;
 5302:                              error:{SpawnType, badopt} when SpawnType == spawn_request ->
 5303:                                  ok
 5304:                          end
 5305:                  end,
 5306: 
 5307:     SpawnError([{monitor, {{alias, explicit_unalias}}}]),
 5308:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{alias,alias}]}]),
 5309:     SpawnError([{monitor, [{aliases,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5310:     SpawnError([{monitors, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5311:     
 5312:     {P1, MA1} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5313:                               [{alias, A1}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5314:                               A1 ! {A1, 1},
 5315:                               A1 ! {A1, 2},
 5316:                               [{A1, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5317:                               A1 ! {A1, 3},
 5318:                               A1 ! {A1, 4},
 5319:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5320:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias,explicit_unalias}]}]),
 5321:     P1 ! {alias, MA1},
 5322:     [{MA1,1},{MA1,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5323:     unalias(MA1),
 5324:     P1 ! {MA1, continue},
 5325:     [{'DOWN', MA1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5326: 
 5327:     {P2, MA2} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5328:                               [{alias, A2}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5329:                               A2 ! {A2, 1},
 5330:                               A2 ! {A2, 2},
 5331:                               [{A2, continue}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5332:                               A2 ! {A2, 3},
 5333:                               A2 ! {A2, 4},
 5334:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5335:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5336:     P2 ! {alias, MA2},
 5337:     [{MA2,1},{MA2,2}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5338:     demonitor(MA2),
 5339:     M2 = monitor(process, P2),
 5340:     P2 ! {MA2, continue},
 5341:     [{'DOWN', M2, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5342: 
 5343:     {P3, MA3} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5344:                               [{alias, A3}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5345:                               A3 ! {A3, 1},
 5346:                               A3 ! {A3, 2},
 5347:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5348:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5349:     P3 ! {alias, MA3},
 5350:     [{MA3,1},{MA3,2},{'DOWN', MA3, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5351:     {_P3_1, M3_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5352:                                   fun () ->
 5353:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 3},
 5354:                                           MA3 ! {MA3, 4},
 5355:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5356:                                   end),
 5357:     [{'DOWN', M3_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5358:     
 5359:     {P4, MA4} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5360:                               [{alias, _A4}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5361:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5362:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5363:     P4 ! {alias, MA4},
 5364:     [{'DOWN', MA4, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5365:     {_P4_1, M4_1} = spawn_monitor(Node,
 5366:                                   fun () ->
 5367:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 3},
 5368:                                           MA4 ! {MA4, 4},
 5369:                                           exit(ExitReason)
 5370:                                   end),
 5371:     [{'DOWN', M4_1, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5372: 
 5373:     {P5, MA5} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5374:                               [{alias, A5}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5375:                               A5 ! {A5, 1},
 5376:                               A5 ! {A5, 2},
 5377:                               exit(ExitReason)
 5378:                       end, [{monitor, [{alias, reply_demonitor}]}]),
 5379:     M_5 = monitor(process, P5),
 5380:     P5 ! {alias, MA5},
 5381:     [{MA5,1},{'DOWN', M_5, _, _, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(2),
 5382: 
 5383:     case Node == node() of
 5384:         true ->
 5385:             ok;
 5386:         false ->
 5387:             {P6, MA6} = Spawn(fun () ->
 5388:                                       [{alias, A6}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5389:                                       A6 ! {A6, 1},
 5390:                                       A6 ! {A6, 2},
 5391:                                       receive after infinity -> ok end
 5392:                               end, [{monitor, [{alias, demonitor}]}]),
 5393:             P6 ! {alias, MA6},
 5394:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5395:             [{MA6,1},{MA6,2},{'DOWN', MA6, _, _, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(3),
 5396:             {_P6_1, M6_1} = spawn_monitor(fun () ->
 5397:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 3},
 5398:                                                   MA6 ! {MA6, 4}
 5399:                                           end),
 5400:             [{'DOWN', M6_1, _, _, _}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5401:     
 5402:             ok
 5403:     end.
 5404: 
 5405: demonitor_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5406:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5407:     Fun = fun () ->
 5408:                   receive
 5409:                       {alias, Alias} ->
 5410:                           Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5411:                   end
 5412:           end,
 5413:     LPid = spawn(Fun),
 5414:     RPid = spawn(Node, Fun),
 5415:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5416:     erlang:demonitor(AliasMonitor),
 5417:     LPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5418:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, LPid} -> ok end,
 5419:     %% Demonitor signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5420:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5421:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5422:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5423:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5424:     exit(LPid, kill),
 5425:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5426:     false = is_process_alive(LPid),
 5427:     ok.
 5428: 
 5429: down_aliasmonitor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5430:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5431:     LPid = spawn(fun () -> receive infinty -> ok end end),
 5432:     RPid = spawn(Node,
 5433:                  fun () ->
 5434:                          receive
 5435:                              {alias, Alias} ->
 5436:                                  Alias ! {alias_reply, Alias, self()}
 5437:                          end
 5438:                  end),
 5439:     AliasMonitor = erlang:monitor(process, LPid, [{alias, explicit_unalias}]),
 5440:     exit(LPid, bye),
 5441:     receive {'DOWN', AliasMonitor, process, LPid, bye} -> ok end,
 5442:     %% Down signal has been received and cleaned up. Cleanup of
 5443:     %% it erroneously removed it from the alias table which caused
 5444:     %% remote use of the alias to stop working...
 5445:     RPid ! {alias, AliasMonitor},
 5446:     receive {alias_reply, AliasMonitor, RPid} -> ok end,
 5447:     peer:stop(Peer),
 5448:     ok.
 5449: 
 5450: monitor_tag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5451:     %% Exit signals with immediate exit reasons are sent
 5452:     %% in a different manner than compound exit reasons, and
 5453:     %% immediate tags are stored in a different manner than
 5454:     %% compound tags.
 5455:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5456:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5457:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5458:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5459:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5460:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5461:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5462:     monitor_tag_test(undefined, node(), spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5463:     {ok, Peer1, Node1} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5464:     monitor_tag_test(Peer1, Node1, spawn_opt, immed, normal),
 5465:     {ok, Peer2, Node2} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5466:     monitor_tag_test(Peer2, Node2, spawn_opt, make_ref(), normal),
 5467:     {ok, Peer3, Node3} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5468:     monitor_tag_test(Peer3, Node3, spawn_opt, immed, make_ref()),
 5469:     {ok, Peer4, Node4} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5470:     monitor_tag_test(Peer4, Node4, spawn_opt, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5471:     {ok, Peer5, Node5} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5472:     monitor_tag_test(Peer5, Node5, spawn_request, immed, normal),
 5473:     {ok, Peer6, Node6} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5474:     monitor_tag_test(Peer6, Node6, spawn_request, make_ref(), normal),
 5475:     {ok, Peer7, Node7} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5476:     monitor_tag_test(Peer7, Node7, spawn_request, immed, make_ref()),
 5477:     {ok, Peer8, Node8} = ?CT_PEER(),
 5478:     monitor_tag_test(Peer8, Node8, spawn_request, make_ref(), make_ref()),
 5479:     ok.
 5480: 
 5481: monitor_tag_test(Peer, Node, SpawnType, Tag, ExitReason) ->
 5482: 
 5483:     P1 = spawn(Node, fun () -> receive go -> ok end, exit(ExitReason) end),
 5484:     M1 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5485:     P1 ! go,
 5486:     [{Tag, M1, process, P1, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5487: 
 5488:     M1_2 = monitor(process, P1, [{tag, Tag}]),
 5489:     [{Tag, M1_2, process, P1, noproc}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5490: 
 5491:     Spawn = case SpawnType of
 5492:                 spawn_opt ->
 5493:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5494:                             try
 5495:                                 spawn_opt(Node, F, O)
 5496:                             catch
 5497:                                 error:Err ->
 5498:                                     error({spawn_opt, Err})
 5499:                             end
 5500:                     end;
 5501:                 spawn_request ->
 5502:                     fun (F, O) ->
 5503:                             try
 5504:                                 ReqId = spawn_request(Node, F, O),
 5505:                                 receive
 5506:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, ok, P} ->
 5507:                                         {P, ReqId};
 5508:                                     {spawn_reply, ReqId, error, Error} ->
 5509:                                         error(Error)
 5510:                                 end
 5511:                             catch
 5512:                                 error:Err ->
 5513:                                     error({spawn_request, Err})
 5514:                             end
 5515:                     end
 5516:             end,
 5517: 
 5518:     {P2, M2} = Spawn(fun () -> exit(ExitReason) end, [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5519:     [{Tag, M2, process, P2, ExitReason}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5520: 
 5521:     case Node == node() of
 5522:         true ->
 5523:             ok;
 5524:         false ->
 5525:             {P3, M3} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5526:                              [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5527:             stop_node(Peer, Node),
 5528:             [{Tag, M3, process, P3, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1),
 5529: 
 5530:             case SpawnType == spawn_opt of
 5531:                 true ->
 5532:                     {P6, M6} = Spawn(fun () -> receive after infinity -> ok end end,
 5533:                                      [{monitor, [{tag, Tag}]}]),
 5534:                     [{Tag, M6, process, P6, noconnection}] = recv_msgs(1);
 5535:                 false ->
 5536:                     ok
 5537:             end,
 5538:             ok
 5539:     end.
 5540: 
 5541: no_pid_wrap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5542:     process_flag(priority, high),
 5543:     SOnln = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 5544:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5545:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5546:     false = is_process_alive(Pid),
 5547:     ChkSpwndPid = fun () ->
 5548:                           check_spawned_pid(Pid)
 5549:                   end,
 5550:     MPs = maps:from_list(lists:map(fun (_) ->
 5551:                                            {P, M} = spawn_monitor(ChkSpwndPid),
 5552:                                            {M, P}
 5553:                                    end, lists:seq(1, SOnln))),
 5554:     Res = receive
 5555:               {'DOWN', M, process, _, pid_reused} when is_map_key(M, MPs) ->
 5556:                   case erlang:system_info(wordsize) of
 5557:                       8 ->
 5558:                           ct:fail("Process identifier reused"),
 5559:                           error;
 5560:                       4 ->
 5561:                           {comment,
 5562:                            "Process identifer reused, but this is"
 5563:                            ++ "expected since this is a 32-bit system"}
 5564:                   end;
 5565:               {'DOWN', _, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5566:                   ct:fail({unexpected_down, Down}),
 5567:                   error
 5568:           after
 5569:               3*60*1000 ->
 5570:                   ok
 5571:           end,
 5572:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5573:                          exit(P, kill)
 5574:                  end, MPs),
 5575:     maps:foreach(fun (_, P) ->
 5576:                          false = is_process_alive(P)
 5577:                  end, MPs),
 5578:     Res.
 5579: 
 5580: check_spawned_pid(OldPid) ->
 5581:     Pid = spawn(fun () -> ok end),
 5582:     case OldPid == Pid of
 5583:         false ->
 5584:             check_spawned_pid(OldPid);
 5585:         true ->
 5586:             exit(pid_reused)
 5587:     end.
 5588: 
 5589: %% Internal functions
 5590: 
 5591: recv_msgs(N) ->
 5592:     recv_msgs(N, []).
 5593: 
 5594: recv_msgs(0, Msgs) ->
 5595:     lists:reverse(Msgs);
 5596: recv_msgs(N, Msgs) ->
 5597:     receive
 5598:         Msg ->
 5599:             recv_msgs(N-1, [Msg|Msgs])
 5600:     end.
 5601: 
 5602: wait_until(Fun) ->
 5603:     case Fun() of
 5604: 	true -> true;
 5605: 	false -> receive after 10 -> wait_until(Fun) end
 5606:     end.
 5607: 
 5608: tok_loop() ->
 5609:     tok_loop(hej).
 5610: 
 5611: tok_loop(hej) ->
 5612:     tok_loop(hopp);
 5613: tok_loop(hopp) ->
 5614:     tok_loop(hej).
 5615: 
 5616: id(I) -> I.
 5617: 
 5618: stop_node(Peer, Node) ->
 5619:     verify_nc(node()),
 5620:     verify_nc(Node),
 5621:     peer:stop(Peer).
 5622: 
 5623: verify_nc(Node) ->
 5624:     P = self(),
 5625:     Ref = make_ref(),
 5626:     Pid = spawn(Node,
 5627:                 fun() ->
 5628:                         R = erts_test_utils:check_node_dist(fun(E) -> E end),
 5629:                         P ! {Ref, R}
 5630:                 end),
 5631:     MonRef = monitor(process, Pid),
 5632:     receive
 5633:         {Ref, ok} ->
 5634:             demonitor(MonRef,[flush]),
 5635:             ok;
 5636:         {Ref, Error} ->
 5637:             ct:log("~s",[Error]),
 5638:             ct:fail(failed_nc_refc_check);
 5639:         {'DOWN', MonRef, _, _, _} = Down ->
 5640:             ct:log("~p",[Down]),
 5641:             ct:fail(crashed_nc_refc_check)
 5642:     end.
 5643: 
 5644: enable_internal_state() ->
 5645:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state(available_internal_state) of
 5646: 	true -> true;
 5647: 	_ -> erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true)
 5648:     end.
 5649: 
 5650: sys_mem_cond_run(OrigReqSizeMB, TestFun) when is_integer(OrigReqSizeMB) ->
 5651:     %% Debug normally needs more memory, so double the requirement
 5652:     Debug = erlang:system_info(debug_compiled),
 5653:     ReqSizeMB = if Debug -> OrigReqSizeMB * 2; true -> OrigReqSizeMB end,
 5654:     case total_memory() of
 5655: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem), TotMem >= ReqSizeMB ->
 5656: 	    TestFun();
 5657: 	TotMem when is_integer(TotMem) ->
 5658: 	    {skipped, "Not enough memory ("++integer_to_list(TotMem)++" MB)"};
 5659: 	undefined ->
 5660: 	    {skipped, "Could not retrieve memory information"}
 5661:     end.
 5662: 
 5663: 
 5664: total_memory() ->
 5665:     %% Total memory in MB.
 5666:     try
 5667: 	SMD = memsup:get_system_memory_data(),
 5668:         TM = proplists:get_value(
 5669:                available_memory, SMD,
 5670:                proplists:get_value(
 5671:                  total_memory, SMD,
 5672:                  proplists:get_value(
 5673:                    system_total_memory, SMD))),
 5674:         TM div (1024*1024)
 5675:     catch
 5676: 	_ : _ ->
 5677: 	    undefined
 5678:     end.
 5679: 
 5680: start_ei_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5681:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 5682:     FwdNodeExe = filename:join(DataDir, "fwd_node"),
 5683:     Name = atom_to_list(?MODULE)
 5684:         ++ "-" ++ "ei_node"
 5685:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:system_time(second))
 5686:         ++ "-" ++ integer_to_list(erlang:unique_integer([positive])),
 5687:     Cookie = atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie()),
 5688:     HostName = get_hostname(),
 5689:     Node = list_to_atom(Name++"@"++HostName),
 5690:     Creation = integer_to_list(rand:uniform((1 bsl 15) - 4) + 3),
 5691:     Parent = self(),
 5692:     Pid = spawn_link(fun () ->
 5693:                              register(cnode_forward_receiver, self()),
 5694:                              process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 5695:                              Args = ["-sname", Name,
 5696:                                      "-cookie", Cookie,
 5697:                                      "-creation", Creation],
 5698:                              io:format("Starting ei_node: ~p ~p~n",
 5699:                                        [FwdNodeExe, Args]),
 5700:                              Port = erlang:open_port({spawn_executable, FwdNodeExe},
 5701:                                                      [use_stdio, {args, Args}]),
 5702:                              receive
 5703:                                  {Port, {data, "accepting"}} -> ok
 5704:                              end,
 5705:                              ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port)
 5706:                      end),
 5707:     put({ei_node_handler, Node}, Pid),
 5708:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5709:         ok -> {ok, Node};
 5710:         Error -> Error
 5711:     end.
 5712: 
 5713: check_ei_node(Node) ->
 5714:     Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5715:     case get(Key) of
 5716:         undefined ->
 5717:             {error, no_handler};
 5718:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5719:             Pid ! {check_node, self()},
 5720:             receive
 5721:                 {check_node, Pid, Res} ->
 5722:                     Res
 5723:             after 3000 ->
 5724:                     {error, no_handler_response}
 5725:             end
 5726:     end.
 5727: 
 5728: stop_ei_node(Node) ->
 5729:     case check_ei_node(Node) of
 5730:         ok ->
 5731:             Key = {ei_node_handler, Node},
 5732:             case get(Key) of
 5733:                 undefined ->
 5734:                     {error, no_handler};
 5735:                 Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 5736:                     Pid ! {stop_node, self()},
 5737:                     receive
 5738:                         {stop_node, Pid} ->
 5739:                             put(Key, undefined),
 5740:                             ok
 5741:                     after 2000 ->
 5742:                             {error, no_handler_response}
 5743:                     end
 5744:             end;
 5745:         Error ->
 5746:             Error
 5747:     end.
 5748: 
 5749: ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port) ->
 5750:     receive
 5751:         {'EXIT', Parent, Reason} ->
 5752:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5753:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5754:             exit(Reason);
 5755:         {stop_node, Parent} ->
 5756:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5757:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5758:             Parent ! {stop_node, self()},
 5759:             exit(normal);
 5760:         {check_node, Parent} ->
 5761:             Ref = make_ref(),
 5762:             {a_name, Node} ! Ref,
 5763:             receive
 5764:                 Ref ->
 5765:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), ok}
 5766:             after
 5767:                 2000 ->
 5768:                     Parent ! {check_node, self(), {error, no_node_response}}
 5769:             end;
 5770:         Msg ->
 5771:             Msgs = fetch_all_messages([Msg]),
 5772:             erlang:disconnect_node(Node),
 5773:             (catch port_close(Port)),
 5774:             exit({ei_node_handler, Node, unexpected_messages, Msgs})
 5775:     end,
 5776:     ei_node_handler_loop(Node, Parent, Port).
 5777: 
 5778: fetch_all_messages(Msgs) ->
 5779:     receive
 5780:         Msg ->
 5781:             fetch_all_messages([Msg|Msgs])
 5782:     after
 5783:         0 ->
 5784:             Msgs
 5785:     end.
 5786: 
 5787: get_hostname() ->
 5788:     get_hostname(atom_to_list(node())).
 5789: 
 5790: get_hostname([$@ | HostName]) ->
 5791:     HostName;
 5792: get_hostname([_ | Rest]) ->
 5793:     get_hostname(Rest).
 5794: 
 5795: receive_any() ->
 5796:     receive M -> M end.
